member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.DEFAULT_APP_NAME
member.summary: Default application name for service routing ("bannou" - omnipotent routing). Used when no specific app-id is configured for distributed deployment.
member.remarks: WARNING: For routing decisions, use Program.Configuration.EffectiveAppId instead! This constant is only for internal fallback logic in AppConfiguration.EffectiveAppId. Direct use of this constant bypasses configuration and can cause routing issues.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.ORCHESTRATOR_SERVICE_NAME
member.summary: Logical service name for the orchestrator control plane.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.PUBSUB_NAME
member.summary: Default pub/sub component name used by all services.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.DEFAULT_BANNOU_HTTP_PORT
member.summary: Default HTTP port for service mesh communication.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.ENV_BANNOU_APP_ID
member.summary: Environment variable name for app ID.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.ENV_BANNOU_HTTP_ENDPOINT
member.summary: Environment variable name for HTTP endpoint.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.AppConstants.BROADCAST_GUID
member.summary: Special GUID for broadcast messages. When ServiceGuid equals this value, the message is broadcast to all connected peers (excluding sender). Only allowed in Relayed and Internal connection modes; External mode rejects broadcast.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage
member.summary: Represents a complete binary message in the Bannou WebSocket protocol. Request messages use a 31-byte header, response messages use a 16-byte header. Provides zero-copy parsing and serialization for optimal performance.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.HeaderSize
member.summary: Size of the binary header in bytes for request messages.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ResponseHeaderSize
member.summary: Size of the binary header in bytes for response messages. Response headers are smaller because ServiceGuid is not needed (client correlates via MessageId).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ServiceGuid
member.summary: Client-salted service GUID for routing (only used in request messages). For response messages, this is Guid.Empty since routing is not needed.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response code for response messages (0 = OK, non-zero = error). Only meaningful when Flags has Response set.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags). For error responses (non-zero ResponseCode), this is empty.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags,System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.UInt64,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new binary message with the specified parameters (for requests).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags,System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.UInt64,System.Byte,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new binary message with the specified parameters (for responses).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.FromJson(System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.UInt64,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags)
member.summary: Creates a binary message from a JSON string payload.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.FromBinary(System.UInt16,System.UInt32,System.Guid,System.UInt64,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags)
member.summary: Creates a binary message from raw binary payload.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.CreateResponse(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte})
member.summary: Creates a response message for the given request. For error responses (non-zero responseCode), the payload should be empty. For success responses (responseCode = 0), the payload contains the response data.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.GetJsonPayload
member.summary: Gets the JSON payload as a string (if the message is JSON).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.Parse(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses a binary message from a byte array. Automatically detects whether this is a request (31-byte header) or response (16-byte header).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ToByteArray
member.summary: Serializes the binary message to a byte array. Uses 31-byte header for requests, 16-byte header for responses.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ExpectsResponse
member.summary: Returns true if this message expects a response.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsResponse
member.summary: Returns true if this message is a response to another message.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsClientRouted
member.summary: Returns true if this message should be routed to a client (not a service).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsHighPriority
member.summary: Returns true if this message has high priority.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsSuccess
member.summary: Returns true if this is a successful response (ResponseCode is 0). Only meaningful for response messages.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsError
member.summary: Returns true if this is an error response (ResponseCode is non-zero). Only meaningful for response messages.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.IsMeta
member.summary: Returns true if this message requests endpoint metadata instead of executing the endpoint. When set, the Channel field specifies the meta type: 0 = endpoint-info, 1 = request-schema, 2 = response-schema, 3 = full-schema.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.BinaryMessage.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the message for debugging.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags
member.summary: Bit flags controlling message behavior in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol. These flags provide zero-copy routing and performance optimizations.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.None
member.summary: Default - JSON text, service request, unencrypted, standard priority, expects response

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Binary
member.summary: Message payload is binary data (not JSON)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.HighPriority
member.summary: Deliver at high priority, skip to front of queues

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Client
member.summary: Route to another WebSocket client (not a Bannou service)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Response
member.summary: Message is a response to an RPC (not a new request)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.MessageFlags.Meta
member.summary: Request metadata about endpoint instead of executing it. When set, the Channel field specifies the meta type: 0 = endpoint-info, 1 = request-schema, 2 = response-schema, 3 = full-schema. Connect service transforms the path and routes to companion endpoints.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder
member.summary: Network byte order utilities for cross-platform binary protocol compatibility. Ensures consistent endianness across all client and server implementations.

member.summary: Reads a GUID from consistent network byte order. Uses RFC 4122 standard byte ordering for cross-platform compatibility.

member.summary: Validates that the current system can handle network byte order operations. Returns true if BinaryPrimitives are available (should always be true in .NET Core/5+).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.NetworkByteOrder.TestNetworkByteOrderCompatibility
member.summary: Tests cross-platform compatibility of network byte order operations. Useful for unit testing and validation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator
member.summary: Dependency-free GUID generation utilities for client-server security. Provides client-salted GUIDs to prevent cross-session exploitation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateServiceGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-salted GUID for a service endpoint. Each client gets unique GUIDs for identical services, preventing security exploits.
member.param: Optional additional entropy for specialized use cases
member.returns: Deterministic but unique GUID for this session-service combination

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateClientGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-to-client routing GUID for P2P communication.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateSessionShortcutGuid(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a client-salted GUID for a session shortcut. Uses UUID version 7 bits to distinguish from service GUIDs (version 5) and client-to-client GUIDs (version 6).
member.returns: Deterministic but unique GUID for this session-shortcut combination

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsSessionShortcutGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a session shortcut GUID (version 7). Useful for detecting shortcut GUIDs vs service GUIDs (v5) or client GUIDs (v6).
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 7 bits set (session shortcut)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsServiceGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a service GUID (version 5).
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 5 bits set (service capability)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.IsClientGuid(System.Guid)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID is a client-to-client GUID (version 6).
member.returns: True if the GUID has version 6 bits set (client-to-client routing)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateMessageId
member.summary: Generates a unique message ID for request/response correlation. Uses timestamp and entropy for uniqueness.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.ValidateServiceGuid(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validates that a GUID was generated by this system. Useful for detecting tampered or externally-generated GUIDs.
member.param: Session ID that should have generated this GUID
member.returns: True if the GUID is valid for these parameters

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Protocol.GuidGenerator.GenerateServerSalt
member.summary: Creates a server salt with cryptographic randomness. Should be generated once per server instance and reused.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Connect service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ProxyInternalRequestAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.InternalProxyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Internal API proxy for stateless requests
member.remarks:
Stateless HTTP proxy for internal requests that don't require persistent sessions.
Applies permission validation and rate limiting based on agent role and context.
Perfect for AI agents making one-off API calls or bulk operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.GetClientCapabilitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetClientCapabilitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get client capability manifest (GUID API mappings)
member.remarks:
Returns the capability manifest for the authenticated client's session.
Maps client-salted GUIDs to available API endpoints based on the client's
current permissions and session state.
**Security**: Each client receives unique GUIDs for the same API endpoints.
This prevents cross-session exploitation and enables per-client rate limiting.
**Dynamic Updates**: Capabilities may change during a session when:
- Role changes occur (admin promotion, etc.)
- Subscription status changes
- Session state transitions
Clients should listen for capability update events via WebSocket to stay current.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Initiates a WebSocket connection for real-time communication.
Requires JWT authentication via Authorization header.
**Connection Flow:**
1. Send HTTP GET request with `Connection: Upgrade` and `Upgrade: websocket` headers
2. Include `Authorization: Bearer <jwt_token>` header for authentication
3. Server validates JWT and extracts user claims (roles, scopes, services)
4. Connection upgrades to WebSocket protocol
5. Client can send binary messages using the custom protocol
**Reconnection:**
For existing sessions, use `Authorization: Reconnect <reconnect_token>` instead.
member.param: Must be "Upgrade" to initiate WebSocket connection
Must be "websocket" to specify protocol upgrade

JWT Bearer token for new connections: "Bearer <jwt_token>"
Reconnect token for existing sessions: "Reconnect <reconnect_token>"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.ConnectWebSocketPostAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Connection2,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.Upgrade2,System.String,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Alternative POST method for establishing WebSocket connections.
Functionally identical to the GET method but supports clients that
require POST for WebSocket upgrades.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.IConnectClient.GetAccountSessionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.GetAccountSessionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all active WebSocket sessions for an account
member.remarks:
Returns all active WebSocket session IDs for a specified account.
This is an internal endpoint used by services that need to know which
sessions are currently connected for a given account.
**Use Cases:**
- GameSessionService periodic cache sync
- Service-to-service session discovery
- Admin session management
**Note:** Session IDs returned are those with active WebSocket connections.
Sessions in reconnection windows may not appear in this list.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ConnectRequest
member.summary:
Request model for WebSocket connection establishment.
Currently contains no specific fields but extends the base ApiRequest.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ResponseCodes
member.summary:
Response codes used in the binary protocol for success/error indication.
Provides fine-grained error reporting for different failure scenarios.
**Request error codes (10-19):**
- 10 (RequestError): Generic malformed request
- 11 (RequestTooLarge): Payload exceeds maximum size
- 12 (TooManyRequests): Rate limit exceeded
- 13 (InvalidRequestChannel): Invalid channel number
- 14 (TextProtocolNotSupported): Text WebSocket frames are not supported; use binary protocol
**Broadcast error codes (40-49):**
- 40 (BroadcastNotAllowed): Broadcast attempted in External mode where it is forbidden
**Shortcut-specific error codes (70-79):**
- 70 (ShortcutExpired): Session shortcut has expired (TTL exceeded)
- 71 (ShortcutTargetNotFound): Shortcut's target capability no longer available
- 72 (ShortcutRevoked): Session shortcut was explicitly revoked

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service request message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Bytes 0: Message Flags (1 byte)
- Bytes 1-2: Channel ID (2 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 3-6: Sequence Number (4 bytes, big-endian)
- Bytes 7-22: Service GUID (16 bytes)
- Bytes 23-30: Message ID (8 bytes)
- Bytes 31+: Payload (variable length)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Flags
member.summary: Bit flags controlling message behavior (binary, encrypted, compressed, etc.)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Channel
member.summary: Channel for sequential message processing (0-65535, 0 = default)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Per-channel sequence number for message ordering

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.MessageId
member.summary: Unique message ID for request/response correlation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceRequestMessage.Payload
member.summary: Message payload (JSON or binary data based on flags)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage
member.summary:
Structure of a service response message in the enhanced 31-byte binary protocol.
This schema is for documentation - actual messages are binary.
**Binary Header Layout (31 bytes):**
- Same as ServiceRequestMessage but with Response flag (0x40) set

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Connect.ServiceResponseMessage.ResponseCode
member.summary: Response status code indicating success or specific error condition

Sent to client when their available API capabilities change.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.CapabilityManifestEvent.PeerGuid
member.summary:
Unique GUID for peer-to-peer routing on this Connect node.
Other connections on the same Connect node can route messages directly
to this connection using this GUID with the Client flag (0x20).
Enables zero-copy message forwarding between Game Servers, Actor Pool Nodes, and clients.
Note: Only valid while connected to the same Connect instance.

member.summary:
Reason for disconnection:
- graceful_disconnect: Client-initiated or idle timeout
- session_invalidated: Session was revoked (e.g., logout, account deleted)
- server_shutdown: Server is shutting down gracefully
- forced_disconnect: Administrative disconnection

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SystemErrorEvent
member.summary:
Generic error notification sent to client.
Used for recoverable errors that the client should be aware of.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SystemErrorEvent.Recoverable
member.summary: Whether the client can retry the operation

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionCapabilitiesEvent
member.summary:
Internal event carrying compiled capabilities from Permission to Connect.
NOT forwarded to clients - Connect intercepts, generates client-salted GUIDs,
and sends CapabilityManifestEvent to the client.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionCapabilitiesEvent.EventName
member.summary: Fixed event type identifier (internal, not forwarded to client)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionCapabilitiesEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID these capabilities apply to

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionCapabilitiesEvent.Permissions
member.summary: Map of ServiceID -> List of available endpoints (e.g., "account" -> ["/account/get"])

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SystemNotificationEvent
member.summary:
Generic notification event for system-level messages.
Used for announcements, maintenance notices, etc.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent
member.summary:
Published by services to create or update a session shortcut.
Sent to CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId} topic for the specific session.
Connect handles this event internally and does NOT forward to the client.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent.Shortcut
member.summary: The session shortcut definition containing the pre-bound payload and routing information.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutPublishedEvent.ReplaceExisting
member.summary:
If true and a shortcut with the same routeGuid exists, replace it.
If false and shortcut exists, the event is ignored.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent
member.summary:
Published by services to remove shortcuts.
Sent to CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId} topic for the specific session.
Supports both single-shortcut revocation (by routeGuid) and
bulk revocation (all shortcuts from a sourceService).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.RouteGuid
member.summary:
Specific shortcut to revoke.
If provided, only this shortcut is removed.
Mutually exclusive with revokeByService.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.ShortcutRevokedEvent.RevokeByService
member.summary:
Revoke ALL shortcuts from this source service.
Used when a service needs to clear all its shortcuts.
Mutually exclusive with routeGuid.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut
member.summary:
A pre-bound API call that clients can invoke with a single GUID.
The boundPayload is injected by Connect when the shortcut is invoked.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.RouteGuid
member.summary:
Client-salted GUID for invoking this shortcut.
Uses UUID version 7 bits to distinguish from service GUIDs (version 5).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.TargetGuid
member.summary:
The actual service capability GUID this shortcut invokes.
Must be a valid capability in the client's current capability manifest.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.BoundPayload
member.summary:
Pre-serialized JSON payload passed unchanged to the target service.
Connect treats this as opaque bytes - no deserialization or modification.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcut.Metadata
member.summary: Metadata about the shortcut including display name, source service, and lifecycle information.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata
member.summary: Metadata about a session shortcut for display, debugging, and lifecycle management.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.Name
member.summary:
Machine-readable identifier for this shortcut.
Examples: "join_game_{service}", "get_my_stats"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.Description
member.summary: Human-readable description of what this shortcut does.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.SourceService
member.summary: The service that created this shortcut.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.TargetMethod
member.summary: The target HTTP method for routing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.ExpiresAt
member.summary:
Optional TTL for this shortcut.
If set, Connect automatically removes the shortcut after this time.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.Tags
member.summary: Optional categorization tags for client-side organization.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.ClientEvents.SessionShortcutMetadata.DisplayName
member.summary: Optional user-friendly name for display in client UIs.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.IActorClient.InjectPerceptionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.InjectPerceptionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Inject a perception event into an actor's queue (testing)
member.remarks:
Injects a perception event directly into the actor's perception queue
for testing purposes. Useful for testing actor behavior without a
full game server setup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.IActorClient.QueryOptionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query an actor for its available options
member.remarks:
Query an actor for its available options (combat, dialogue, exploration, etc.).
Options are maintained by the actor in its state and returned based on requested
freshness level. This enables Event Brain actors to ask participants "what can
you do?" for choreography and coordination.
Freshness levels:
- fresh: Inject context and wait for actor to recompute options
- cached: Return cached options if within maxAgeMs, else recompute
- stale_ok: Return cached options regardless of age

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.IActorClient.StartEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.StartEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Start an encounter managed by an Event Brain actor
member.remarks:
Initializes an encounter with the specified participants. The Event Brain actor
will coordinate the encounter, sending instructions to participant NPC Brain actors
via their character perception channels.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.IActorClient.UpdateEncounterPhaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.UpdateEncounterPhaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update the phase of an active encounter
member.remarks:
Updates the phase of an encounter being managed by an Event Brain actor.
Phase changes are logged and can trigger behavior changes in participant actors.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.IActorClient.EndEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.EndEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Ends an encounter being managed by an Event Brain actor. This clears the
encounter state and allows the actor to manage a new encounter.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.IActorClient.GetEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.GetEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get the current encounter state for an actor
member.remarks:
Retrieves the current encounter state for an Event Brain actor. Returns
null encounter data if the actor is not managing an encounter.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorClient.QueryOptionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query an actor for its available options
member.remarks:
Query an actor for its available options (combat, dialogue, exploration, etc.).
Options are maintained by the actor in its state and returned based on requested
freshness level. This enables Event Brain actors to ask participants "what can
you do?" for choreography and coordination.
Freshness levels:
- fresh: Inject context and wait for actor to recompute options
- cached: Return cached options if within maxAgeMs, else recompute
- stale_ok: Return cached options regardless of age

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorClient.StartEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.StartEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Start an encounter managed by an Event Brain actor
member.remarks:
Initializes an encounter with the specified participants. The Event Brain actor
will coordinate the encounter, sending instructions to participant NPC Brain actors
via their character perception channels.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorClient.UpdateEncounterPhaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.UpdateEncounterPhaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update the phase of an active encounter
member.remarks:
Updates the phase of an encounter being managed by an Event Brain actor.
Phase changes are logged and can trigger behavior changes in participant actors.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorClient.EndEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.EndEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Ends an encounter being managed by an Event Brain actor. This clears the
encounter state and allows the actor to manage a new encounter.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorClient.GetEncounterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.GetEncounterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get the current encounter state for an actor
member.remarks:
Retrieves the current encounter state for an Event Brain actor. Returns
null encounter data if the actor is not managing an encounter.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData
member.summary:
Data representing a perception event for an actor.
Spatial context can be provided in two ways (hybrid approach):
1. Typed: Use the optional spatialContext field for structured spatial data
2. Schema-less: Use perceptionType="spatial" with data containing spatial info
The typed approach is recommended when game server has structured spatial data.
The schema-less approach allows flexibility for game-specific spatial formats.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.PerceptionType
member.summary:
Perception type. Common values: visual, auditory, tactile, olfactory,
proprioceptive, spatial. Use "spatial" for schema-less spatial data in 'data' field.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.SourceId
member.summary: ID of the entity causing this perception

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.SourceType
member.summary: Type of source (character, npc, object, environment, coordinator, scheduled, message)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.Data
member.summary:
Perception-specific data. For perceptionType="spatial", this can contain
game-specific spatial context in any format the game server defines.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.PerceptionData.SpatialContext
member.summary:
Optional typed spatial context from game server's local spatial state.
Provides structured information about terrain, nearby objects, hazards, etc.
Alternative to using perceptionType="spatial" with schema-less data.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext
member.summary:
Spatial context derived from game server's authoritative spatial state.
Included in perception events to give NPC actors awareness of their environment
without requiring direct map subscriptions.
Note: additionalProperties=true allows game-specific extensions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.TerrainType
member.summary: Terrain type at character position (grass, stone, water, etc.)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.PathableDirections
member.summary: Directions the character can move (for navigation awareness)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.CoverNearby
member.summary: Whether cover is available within close range

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.Indoors
member.summary: Whether character is currently indoors/under roof

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.SpatialContext.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest
member.summary:
Query an actor for its available options. Options are maintained by the actor
in its state.memories.{queryType}_options and returned based on requested freshness.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.ActorId
member.summary: ID of the actor to query

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.Freshness
member.summary:
Requested freshness level. Defaults to 'cached'.
- fresh: Inject context and wait for actor to recompute
- cached: Return cached options if within maxAgeMs
- stale_ok: Return whatever is cached, even if expired

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.MaxAgeMs
member.summary:
Maximum age of cached options in milliseconds (for 'cached' freshness).
Defaults to 5000ms. If cached options are older, behavior depends on
freshness level.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsRequest.Context
member.summary:
Optional context for the query. When provided with freshness='fresh',
this context is injected as a perception to the actor, triggering
context-sensitive option recomputation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse
member.summary: Response containing the actor's available options

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.Options
member.summary: Available options for the queried type

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.ComputedAt
member.summary: When these options were last computed by the actor

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.AgeMs
member.summary: Age of options in milliseconds (now - computedAt)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.QueryOptionsResponse.CharacterContext
member.summary:
Character-specific context that influenced these options.
Only present for character-based actors.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryType
member.summary:
Type of options to query. Actors maintain options in state.memories.{type}_options.
Well-known types are defined; actors can also expose custom types.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsFreshness
member.summary: Controls caching behavior for options queries

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption
member.summary:
A single option available to the actor. The standardized fields enable
Event Brain to reason about options; additional fields allow actor-specific data.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.ActionId
member.summary:
Unique identifier for this action within the option type.
Examples: "sword_slash", "greet_friendly", "climb_wall"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Preference
member.summary:
How much the actor prefers this option (0-1), based on personality,
combat preferences, current state, etc. Higher = more preferred.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Risk
member.summary: Estimated risk of this action (0=safe, 1=very risky)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Available
member.summary: Whether this option is currently available (requirements met)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.Requirements
member.summary: Requirements that must be met for this option

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.CooldownMs
member.summary: Milliseconds until this option becomes available again (if on cooldown)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ActorOption.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext
member.summary:
Context provided with a fresh query. Injected as a perception to the actor
to trigger context-sensitive option recomputation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext.CombatState
member.summary: Current combat state (approaching, engaged, retreating, etc.)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext.OpponentIds
member.summary: IDs of opponents in the current encounter

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext.AllyIds

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext.EnvironmentTags

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext.Urgency
member.summary: How urgent is this query (affects option prioritization)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.OptionsQueryContext.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.CharacterOptionContext
member.summary: Character-specific context that influenced option computation

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.CharacterOptionContext.CombatStyle
member.summary: Character's combat style (aggressive, defensive, balanced, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction
member.summary:
Instruction sent to a participant actor by Event Brain to execute a choreographed sequence.
Delivered via emit_perception with perception_type "choreography_instruction".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.EncounterId
member.summary: ID of the coordinated encounter this instruction belongs to

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.SequenceId
member.summary:
Unique ID for this sequence within the choreography.
Used for acknowledgment and sync point coordination.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.Actions
member.summary:
Ordered list of actions for the participant to execute.
Multiple actions allow for combos or reaction sequences.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.Timing
member.summary: When and how to start executing this sequence

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.Priority
member.summary:
How strongly to prefer this choreography over actor's own choices.
Higher priority may interrupt current actions.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.CanInterrupt
member.summary:
Whether participant can interrupt the sequence if a better opportunity arises.
If false, participant should complete the sequence unless impossible.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.ExpectedOutcome
member.summary:
Expected outcome of this sequence (e.g., "hit", "miss", "block").
Used for coordinating reactions with other participants.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyInstruction.OnComplete
member.summary:
Event to emit when sequence completes (e.g., "sync_point.attack_landed").
Other participants may be waiting on this.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction
member.summary:
A single action within a choreographed sequence.
ActionId should match one from the participant's options.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.ActionId
member.summary:
Action identifier matching one from the actor's options.
Examples: "sword_slash", "dodge_roll", "taunt"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.TargetId
member.summary:
Target actor ID for the action, if applicable.
Null for untargeted actions like movement or taunts.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.Position
member.summary: Target position for movement or placement actions

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.DurationMs
member.summary:
Expected duration in milliseconds.
Used for timing subsequent actions and sync points.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.Style
member.summary:
Stylistic modifier for the action (e.g., "dramatic", "desperate", "confident").
Actors may adjust animation/presentation based on style.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.DelayMs
member.summary:
Delay before starting this action (relative to previous action completion).
Allows precise timing within sequences.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyAction.AdditionalProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets additional properties not defined in the schema.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming
member.summary: Controls when a choreographed sequence should begin execution

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.StartAt
member.summary:
When to start executing the sequence.
- immediate: Start as soon as instruction received
- after_previous: Start after current action completes
- sync_point: Wait for specified sync point event

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.SyncPointId
member.summary:
Sync point to wait for (required when startAt=sync_point).
Examples: "attack_landed", "guard_raised", "combo_ready"

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.MaxWaitMs
member.summary:
Maximum time to wait for sync point in milliseconds.
If exceeded, sequence may start anyway or be cancelled.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyTiming.WindowMs
member.summary:
Time window during which the action can start.
Allows for natural timing variation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyPriority
member.summary:
How strongly the actor should prefer the choreographed action over their own choices.
- low: Suggestion; actor may ignore if they prefer something else
- normal: Standard choreography; follow unless clearly suboptimal
- high: Important sequence; should follow even if not preferred
- override: Critical moment; must follow unless physically impossible

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyStartCondition
member.summary: When to begin executing a choreographed sequence

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Actor.ChoreographyPosition
member.summary: 3D position for choreography movement and placement actions

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Analytics.IAnalyticsClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Analytics service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Analytics.IAnalyticsClient.IngestEventAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Analytics.IngestEventRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
High-throughput event ingestion endpoint for recording game events.
Events are buffered in memory and periodically flushed to persistent storage.
Service-only endpoint - not exposed to clients.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Batch event ingestion for high-volume scenarios. Accepts up to 1000 events per request.
Service-only endpoint - not exposed to clients.

member.remarks:

averages, and derived metrics computed from ingested events.

member.remarks:

Useful for dashboards and reporting.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CreateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create asset bundle from multiple assets
member.remarks:
Create a .bannou bundle containing multiple assets.
For large bundles, processing is delegated to the processing pool.
Completion notification sent via WebSocket event.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get bundle manifest and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve bundle metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Supports both native .bannou format and ZIP conversion (cached).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RequestBundleUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BundleUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a pre-made bundle
member.remarks:
Upload a pre-built bundle (.bannou or .zip format).
After upload, the bundle undergoes validation before registration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CreateMetabundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Compose a metabundle by extracting and repackaging assets from multiple
source bundles. The resulting metabundle is a complete physical copy with
provenance metadata tracking the source bundles.
Assets are deduplicated by content hash. If the same asset ID exists in
multiple source bundles with different content hashes, the request fails
with conflict details.
member.returns: Metabundle created or queued for creation

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.GetJobStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetJobStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Poll the status of an async metabundle creation job.
Use the jobId returned from createMetabundle when status was 'queued'.
Clients can either poll this endpoint or wait for the
MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent via WebSocket for completion notification.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.CancelJobAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CancelJobRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Cancel a pending or processing metabundle creation job.
Jobs that are already completed (ready or failed) cannot be cancelled.
Successfully cancelled jobs will emit a MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent
with status 'cancelled' via WebSocket.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.ResolveBundlesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ResolveBundlesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compute optimal bundles for requested assets
member.remarks:
Given a list of asset IDs, compute the optimal set of bundles to download
to obtain all requested assets with minimal transfers.
The algorithm uses greedy set-cover optimization:
1. Find all bundles containing requested assets
2. Select bundles that cover the most uncovered assets
3. Prefer metabundles when coverage is equal (tie-breaker)
4. Include standalone assets for any remaining unresolved IDs
Returns pre-signed download URLs for all selected bundles and assets.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.QueryBundlesByAssetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.QueryBundlesByAssetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all bundles containing a specific asset
member.remarks:
Query the reverse index to find all bundles (source and metabundle)
that contain a specific asset ID. Useful for understanding asset
distribution and debugging resolution issues.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.UpdateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.UpdateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Update metadata for an existing bundle (name, description, tags).
Does not modify bundle contents - for that, create a new bundle.
Increments the bundle version and records the change in version history.
Only the bundle owner or admin can update.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.DeleteBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.DeleteBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a bundle, marking it as deleted but retaining data
for the configured retention period (default 30 days).
Deleted bundles are excluded from resolution and queries by default.
Use permanent=true for immediate, unrecoverable deletion (admin only).
Only the bundle owner or admin can delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.RestoreBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.RestoreBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Restore a bundle that was soft-deleted, making it active again.
Can only restore bundles within their retention period.
Only the bundle owner or admin can restore.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.QueryBundlesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.QueryBundlesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Query bundles with flexible filtering options including:
- Tag matching (exact, exists, not exists)
- Status filtering (active, deleted)
- Date range filtering
- Name search (contains)
- Owner filtering
- Realm and bundle type filtering
Supports pagination and sorting.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.ListBundleVersionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ListBundleVersionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List version history for a bundle
member.remarks:
Get the version history for a bundle, showing all metadata changes
over time. Each version record includes:
- Version number
- When the change was made
- Who made the change
- What changed
- Optional reason for the change
The current version's full metadata snapshot is always included.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.IAssetClient.BulkGetAssetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BulkGetAssetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieve metadata for multiple assets in a single request.
Optionally includes pre-signed download URLs.
Maximum 100 asset IDs per request.

member.remarks:
Search assets using various filters with pagination.
All filters are optional and combine with AND logic.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.CreateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create asset bundle from multiple assets
member.remarks:
Create a .bannou bundle containing multiple assets.
For large bundles, processing is delegated to the processing pool.
Completion notification sent via WebSocket event.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.GetBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get bundle manifest and download URL
member.remarks:
Retrieve bundle metadata and generate a pre-signed download URL.
Supports both native .bannou format and ZIP conversion (cached).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.RequestBundleUploadAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BundleUploadRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request upload URL for a pre-made bundle
member.remarks:
Upload a pre-built bundle (.bannou or .zip format).
After upload, the bundle undergoes validation before registration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.CreateMetabundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CreateMetabundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Compose a metabundle by extracting and repackaging assets from multiple
source bundles. The resulting metabundle is a complete physical copy with
provenance metadata tracking the source bundles.
Assets are deduplicated by content hash. If the same asset ID exists in
multiple source bundles with different content hashes, the request fails
with conflict details.
member.returns: Metabundle created or queued for creation

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.GetJobStatusAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.GetJobStatusRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Poll the status of an async metabundle creation job.
Use the jobId returned from createMetabundle when status was 'queued'.
Clients can either poll this endpoint or wait for the
MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent via WebSocket for completion notification.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.CancelJobAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.CancelJobRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Cancel a pending or processing metabundle creation job.
Jobs that are already completed (ready or failed) cannot be cancelled.
Successfully cancelled jobs will emit a MetabundleCreationCompleteEvent
with status 'cancelled' via WebSocket.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.ResolveBundlesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ResolveBundlesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compute optimal bundles for requested assets
member.remarks:
Given a list of asset IDs, compute the optimal set of bundles to download
to obtain all requested assets with minimal transfers.
The algorithm uses greedy set-cover optimization:
1. Find all bundles containing requested assets
2. Select bundles that cover the most uncovered assets
3. Prefer metabundles when coverage is equal (tie-breaker)
4. Include standalone assets for any remaining unresolved IDs
Returns pre-signed download URLs for all selected bundles and assets.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.QueryBundlesByAssetAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.QueryBundlesByAssetRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all bundles containing a specific asset
member.remarks:
Query the reverse index to find all bundles (source and metabundle)
that contain a specific asset ID. Useful for understanding asset
distribution and debugging resolution issues.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.UpdateBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.UpdateBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Update metadata for an existing bundle (name, description, tags).
Does not modify bundle contents - for that, create a new bundle.
Increments the bundle version and records the change in version history.
Only the bundle owner or admin can update.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.DeleteBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.DeleteBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a bundle, marking it as deleted but retaining data
for the configured retention period (default 30 days).
Deleted bundles are excluded from resolution and queries by default.
Use permanent=true for immediate, unrecoverable deletion (admin only).
Only the bundle owner or admin can delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.RestoreBundleAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.RestoreBundleRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Restore a bundle that was soft-deleted, making it active again.
Can only restore bundles within their retention period.
Only the bundle owner or admin can restore.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.QueryBundlesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.QueryBundlesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Query bundles with flexible filtering options including:
- Tag matching (exact, exists, not exists)
- Status filtering (active, deleted)
- Date range filtering
- Name search (contains)
- Owner filtering
- Realm and bundle type filtering
Supports pagination and sorting.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.ListBundleVersionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.ListBundleVersionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List version history for a bundle
member.remarks:
Get the version history for a bundle, showing all metadata changes
over time. Each version record includes:
- Version number
- When the change was made
- Who made the change
- What changed
- Optional reason for the change
The current version's full metadata snapshot is always included.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.AssetClient.BulkGetAssetsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Asset.BulkGetAssetsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieve metadata for multiple assets in a single request.
Optionally includes pre-signed download URLs.
Maximum 100 asset IDs per request.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.InitOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,System.Uri,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Browser-facing endpoint for initiating OAuth flows. The user's browser navigates
to this URL directly, which then redirects to the OAuth provider.
**Note**: This endpoint uses GET with path parameters because it's a browser
redirect flow, not a WebSocket-routed API call.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.CompleteOAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.Provider,BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.OAuthCallbackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Browser-facing callback endpoint for OAuth providers. The OAuth provider redirects
the user's browser back to this URL after authentication.
**Note**: This endpoint uses path parameters because the callback URL is registered
with OAuth providers and cannot be changed without updating provider configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.VerifySteamAuthAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.SteamVerifyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Validates a Steam Session Ticket obtained from the game client via ISteamUser::GetAuthTicketForWebApi().
The server validates the ticket with Steam's Web API and retrieves the SteamID from Steam's response.
NEVER trust client-provided SteamID - it must come from Steam's authenticated response.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

and administrative monitoring. Includes token-level revocations (by JTI) and account-level

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Auth.IAuthClient.ListProvidersAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns a list of available OAuth and authentication providers based on server configuration.
Providers are only listed if their client credentials are configured.
Steam authentication uses session tickets, not OAuth, but is included for completeness.

Clients can then download entire bundles for efficient bulk loading.
If the bundle doesn't exist, it will be created.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get character with optional related data (personality, backstory, family)
member.remarks:
Retrieves a character with optional include flags for related data.
Use this endpoint when you need aggregated character data from multiple services.
Each included dataset is fetched from its respective service.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.CompressCharacterAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CompressCharacterRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Compress a dead character to archive format
member.remarks:
Compresses a dead character's data for long-term storage.
Generates text summaries of personality, backstory, and relationships.
After compression, detailed data can be deleted to save storage.
Only works on characters with status 'dead'.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.GetCharacterArchiveAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.GetCharacterArchiveRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get compressed archive data for a character

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.CheckCharacterReferencesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.CheckReferencesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check reference count for cleanup eligibility
member.remarks:
Returns the current reference count for a compressed character.
Characters with refCount=0 for the grace period are eligible for deletion.
References include: family relationships, past lives, historical events, memories.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.ICharacterClient.GetCharactersByRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Character.GetCharactersByRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Transfer character to a different realm
member.remarks:
Moves a character from their current realm to a new target realm.
Updates all indexes, validates the target realm exists and is active,
and publishes realm transition events.

encounter record and individual perspectives for each participant.

default values if not specified.

member.remarks:

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves all encounters between two specific characters.

Fast boolean check for whether two characters have any recorded encounters.
Does not apply memory decay or return encounter details.

member.remarks:

member.remarks:
Updates a character's perspective on an encounter. Used when a character
reflects on past events or gains new information about an encounter.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:

is referenced in dialogue, thought, or action. Counteracts memory decay.

member.summary: Delete all encounters for a character

member.remarks:

Normally decay is applied lazily on access, but this can be used for
maintenance or testing purposes.

identified by eventId (typically managed by a game-specific event system).
The significance rating affects how strongly this event influences behavior.

all existing elements or merge with them based on the replaceExisting flag.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient
member.summary: Client interface for the CharacterPersonality service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.GetPersonalityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.GetPersonalityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves the personality profile for a character. Returns 404 if no
personality has been defined for this character.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.SetPersonalityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.SetPersonalityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create or update personality for a character
member.remarks:
Creates or replaces the personality profile for a character. If a personality
already exists, it will be completely replaced (not merged).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.RecordExperienceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.RecordExperienceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Record an experience that may evolve personality
member.remarks:
Records a significant experience for a character. The system evaluates whether
the experience causes trait evolution based on:
- Experience type and its typical trait impacts
- Experience intensity (higher = more likely to cause change)
- Current trait values and resistance
- Random factor for rarity (most experiences don't cause changes)
This endpoint is typically called by the behavior service when significant
events occur during gameplay.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.BatchGetPersonalitiesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.BatchGetPersonalitiesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Bulk load personalities for multiple characters. Used by the behavior service
for efficient region initialization. Characters without personalities are
returned in the notFound array.
Maximum 100 characters per request.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.DeletePersonalityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.DeletePersonalityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes the personality profile for a character. Typically called during
character compression or deletion.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.GetCombatPreferencesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.GetCombatPreferencesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get combat preferences for a character
member.remarks:
Retrieves the combat preferences for a character. Combat preferences
influence tactical decisions in the behavior system, including engagement
style, positioning, and retreat conditions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.SetCombatPreferencesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.SetCombatPreferencesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create or update combat preferences for a character
member.remarks:
Creates or replaces the combat preferences for a character. If preferences
already exist, they will be completely replaced (not merged).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.EvolveCombatPreferencesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.EvolveCombatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Record combat experience that may evolve preferences
member.remarks:
Records a significant combat experience that may cause preference evolution.
Similar to personality evolution, but focused on combat-specific traits.
Combat experiences can shift style (e.g., repeated losses may make a
character more defensive), adjust risk tolerance, or change retreat thresholds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.ICharacterPersonalityClient.DeleteCombatPreferencesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.DeleteCombatPreferencesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Delete combat preferences for a character
member.remarks:
Removes the combat preferences for a character. Typically called during
character compression or deletion.

Based on psychological research (Big Five + game-relevant extensions).

Overall approach to combat situations. Affects target selection,
ability usage, and engagement decisions.

member.summary:
Preferred engagement distance. Influences positioning and
ability selection in combat.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.CharacterPersonality.GroupRole
member.summary:
Preferred role when fighting in groups. Affects positioning,
target priority, and coordination behavior.

member.summary:
Categories of combat experiences that may cause preference evolution.
Each type affects different aspects of combat behavior.
