member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.LockContractAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.LockContractRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Locks a contract under guardian custody (e.g., escrow). A locked contract
cannot be modified, terminated, or have parties transferred except by the
guardian. Requires the contract template to have `transferable: true`.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.UnlockContractAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.UnlockContractRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Unlocks a contract from guardian custody. Only the current guardian can
unlock a contract. Called on escrow refund to restore contract to original state.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.TransferContractPartyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.TransferContractPartyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Transfer party role to new entity
member.remarks:
Transfers a party role to a new entity. Used by escrow to reassign contract
roles on release (e.g., transfer landlord role to new property owner).
Contract must be locked and caller must be the guardian.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.RegisterClauseTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.RegisterClauseTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Registers a new clause type with validation and/or execution handlers.
Clause types are registered globally (plugin-level, admin operation) and
referenced by contract templates via typeCode. Built-in types
(asset_requirement, currency_transfer, item_transfer) are pre-registered.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.ListClauseTypesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.ListClauseTypesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists all registered clause types including built-in types and
custom-registered types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.SetContractTemplateValuesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.SetTemplateValuesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set template values on contract instance
member.remarks:
Sets template values on a contract instance. Called by escrow when binding
a contract to an escrow agreement. Template values are used for variable
substitution in clause handlers (e.g., wallet IDs, container IDs).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.CheckAssetRequirementsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.CheckAssetRequirementsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if asset requirement clauses are satisfied
member.remarks:
Checks if all asset requirement clauses are satisfied. Uses template values
(e.g., PartyA_EscrowWalletId) to query actual balances in escrow wallets/containers
via the registered clause type handlers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.IContractClient.ExecuteContractAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Contract.ExecuteContractRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Executes all contract distribution clauses - distribute assets per clauses,
collect fees, mark contract as executed. This is idempotent - calling twice
returns the same result without re-executing. Contract must be in fulfilled
status and all template values must be set.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Currency service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreateCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new currency type with its behavior rules. Code, precision, and scope
are immutable after creation. Only one base currency per scope is allowed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get currency definition by ID or code
member.remarks:
Retrieves a currency definition by its unique ID or code.
At least one of definitionId or code must be provided.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.ListCurrencyDefinitionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ListCurrencyDefinitionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists currency definitions with optional filtering by realm, scope,
active status, and base currency flag.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.UpdateCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UpdateCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update mutable fields of a currency definition
member.remarks:
Updates mutable fields of a currency definition. Code, precision, and scope
are immutable after creation and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreateWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new wallet for an owner
member.remarks:
Creates a new wallet for a polymorphic owner (account, character, NPC, guild, etc.).
Each owner+ownerType+realm combination can have at most one wallet.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get wallet by ID or owner
member.remarks:
Retrieves a wallet by its ID, or by owner+ownerType+realm combination.
Returns the wallet with all non-zero balances.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetOrCreateWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetOrCreateWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get existing wallet or create if not exists
member.remarks:
Retrieves a wallet if it exists, otherwise creates a new one.
Upsert pattern for convenience.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.FreezeWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.FreezeWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Freeze a wallet to prevent transactions
member.remarks:
Freezes a wallet, preventing all transactions. The reason is recorded
for audit purposes. Frozen wallets can still be queried.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.UnfreezeWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UnfreezeWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Restores a frozen wallet to active status, allowing transactions again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CloseWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CloseWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Permanently closes a wallet and transfers any remaining balances to a
destination wallet. Closed wallets cannot be reopened.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetBalanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetBalanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get balance for a specific currency in a wallet
member.remarks:
Retrieves the current balance for a specific currency in a wallet.
In lazy autogain mode, this may trigger autogain calculation and emit events.
Returns earn cap info and autogain info when applicable.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.BatchGetBalancesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.BatchGetBalancesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get multiple balances in one call
member.remarks:
Retrieves balances for multiple wallet+currency combinations.
Autogain is applied where applicable.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreditCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreditCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Credit currency to a wallet (faucet operation)
member.remarks:
Credits currency to a wallet. This is a faucet operation (currency enters the system).
Enforces earn caps, wallet caps, and global supply caps. Requires idempotency key.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.DebitCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.DebitCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Debit currency from a wallet (sink operation)
member.remarks:
Debits currency from a wallet. This is a sink operation (currency exits the system).
Checks for sufficient funds unless negative balance is allowed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.TransferCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.TransferCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Transfers currency from one wallet to another. Validates transferability,
realm compatibility, and sufficient funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.BatchCreditCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.BatchCreditRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Credit multiple wallets in one call
member.remarks:
Credits currency to multiple wallets in one call. Each operation is independent;
failures do not rollback others. For atomic multi-wallet operations, use lib-escrow.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CalculateConversionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CalculateConversionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Previews a currency conversion calculation without executing it.
Uses base currency exchange rates to compute the effective rate.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.ExecuteConversionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ExecuteConversionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Execute currency conversion in a wallet
member.remarks:
Executes a currency conversion within a single wallet. Debits the source
currency and credits the target currency at the computed exchange rate.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetExchangeRateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetExchangeRateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get exchange rate between two currencies
member.remarks:
Retrieves the exchange rate between two currencies using the base currency
as an intermediary.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.UpdateExchangeRateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UpdateExchangeRateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update a currency's exchange rate to base
member.remarks:
Updates the exchange rate of a currency relative to the base currency.
Cannot set rate on the base currency itself.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetTransactionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves a single transaction record by its unique ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetTransactionHistoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionHistoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get paginated transaction history for a wallet
member.remarks:
Retrieves transaction history for a wallet with optional filters
by currency, transaction type, and date range.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetTransactionsByReferenceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionsByReferenceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get transactions by reference type and ID
member.remarks:
Retrieves all transactions linked to a specific reference (quest, auction,
escrow, etc.).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetGlobalSupplyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetGlobalSupplyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get global supply statistics for a currency
member.remarks:
Returns aggregate supply statistics including total supply, circulation,
escrow amounts, and lifetime mint/burn totals.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetWalletDistributionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetWalletDistributionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns wealth distribution statistics including percentiles and
Gini coefficient for a specific currency.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.EscrowDepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowDepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when a party deposits currency into an escrow agreement.
Immediately debits the wallet (no lock tracking needed - escrow owns the funds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.EscrowReleaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement completes successfully.
Credits the recipient wallet with the released funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.EscrowRefundAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowRefundRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement is cancelled or refunded.
Credits the original depositor wallet with the refunded funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CreateHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates an authorization hold that reserves funds without debiting.
The held amount reduces the effective balance but does not leave the wallet.
Used for pre-auth scenarios (dining, gas, hotels) where final amount may differ.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.CaptureHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CaptureHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Captures an active hold by debiting the final amount (which may be less than
or equal to the held amount). Any difference is released back to available balance.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.ReleaseHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ReleaseHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Releases an active hold, making all held funds available again.
No debit occurs.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ICurrencyClient.GetHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves the current status and details of an authorization hold.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CreateCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new currency type with its behavior rules. Code, precision, and scope
are immutable after creation. Only one base currency per scope is allowed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get currency definition by ID or code
member.remarks:
Retrieves a currency definition by its unique ID or code.
At least one of definitionId or code must be provided.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.ListCurrencyDefinitionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ListCurrencyDefinitionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists currency definitions with optional filtering by realm, scope,
active status, and base currency flag.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.UpdateCurrencyDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UpdateCurrencyDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update mutable fields of a currency definition
member.remarks:
Updates mutable fields of a currency definition. Code, precision, and scope
are immutable after creation and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CreateWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new wallet for an owner
member.remarks:
Creates a new wallet for a polymorphic owner (account, character, NPC, guild, etc.).
Each owner+ownerType+realm combination can have at most one wallet.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get wallet by ID or owner
member.remarks:
Retrieves a wallet by its ID, or by owner+ownerType+realm combination.
Returns the wallet with all non-zero balances.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetOrCreateWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetOrCreateWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get existing wallet or create if not exists
member.remarks:
Retrieves a wallet if it exists, otherwise creates a new one.
Upsert pattern for convenience.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.FreezeWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.FreezeWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Freeze a wallet to prevent transactions
member.remarks:
Freezes a wallet, preventing all transactions. The reason is recorded
for audit purposes. Frozen wallets can still be queried.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.UnfreezeWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UnfreezeWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Restores a frozen wallet to active status, allowing transactions again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CloseWalletAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CloseWalletRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Permanently closes a wallet and transfers any remaining balances to a
destination wallet. Closed wallets cannot be reopened.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetBalanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetBalanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get balance for a specific currency in a wallet
member.remarks:
Retrieves the current balance for a specific currency in a wallet.
In lazy autogain mode, this may trigger autogain calculation and emit events.
Returns earn cap info and autogain info when applicable.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.BatchGetBalancesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.BatchGetBalancesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get multiple balances in one call
member.remarks:
Retrieves balances for multiple wallet+currency combinations.
Autogain is applied where applicable.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CreditCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreditCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Credit currency to a wallet (faucet operation)
member.remarks:
Credits currency to a wallet. This is a faucet operation (currency enters the system).
Enforces earn caps, wallet caps, and global supply caps. Requires idempotency key.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.DebitCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.DebitCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Debit currency from a wallet (sink operation)
member.remarks:
Debits currency from a wallet. This is a sink operation (currency exits the system).
Checks for sufficient funds unless negative balance is allowed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.TransferCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.TransferCurrencyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Transfers currency from one wallet to another. Validates transferability,
realm compatibility, and sufficient funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.BatchCreditCurrencyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.BatchCreditRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Credit multiple wallets in one call
member.remarks:
Credits currency to multiple wallets in one call. Each operation is independent;
failures do not rollback others. For atomic multi-wallet operations, use lib-escrow.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CalculateConversionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CalculateConversionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Previews a currency conversion calculation without executing it.
Uses base currency exchange rates to compute the effective rate.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.ExecuteConversionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ExecuteConversionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Execute currency conversion in a wallet
member.remarks:
Executes a currency conversion within a single wallet. Debits the source
currency and credits the target currency at the computed exchange rate.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetExchangeRateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetExchangeRateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get exchange rate between two currencies
member.remarks:
Retrieves the exchange rate between two currencies using the base currency
as an intermediary.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.UpdateExchangeRateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.UpdateExchangeRateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update a currency's exchange rate to base
member.remarks:
Updates the exchange rate of a currency relative to the base currency.
Cannot set rate on the base currency itself.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetTransactionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves a single transaction record by its unique ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetTransactionHistoryAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionHistoryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get paginated transaction history for a wallet
member.remarks:
Retrieves transaction history for a wallet with optional filters
by currency, transaction type, and date range.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetTransactionsByReferenceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetTransactionsByReferenceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get transactions by reference type and ID
member.remarks:
Retrieves all transactions linked to a specific reference (quest, auction,
escrow, etc.).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetGlobalSupplyAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetGlobalSupplyRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get global supply statistics for a currency
member.remarks:
Returns aggregate supply statistics including total supply, circulation,
escrow amounts, and lifetime mint/burn totals.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetWalletDistributionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetWalletDistributionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns wealth distribution statistics including percentiles and
Gini coefficient for a specific currency.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.EscrowDepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowDepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when a party deposits currency into an escrow agreement.
Immediately debits the wallet (no lock tracking needed - escrow owns the funds).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.EscrowReleaseAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement completes successfully.
Credits the recipient wallet with the released funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.EscrowRefundAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.EscrowRefundRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Called by lib-escrow when an escrow agreement is cancelled or refunded.
Credits the original depositor wallet with the refunded funds.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CreateHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CreateHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates an authorization hold that reserves funds without debiting.
The held amount reduces the effective balance but does not leave the wallet.
Used for pre-auth scenarios (dining, gas, hotels) where final amount may differ.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.CaptureHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CaptureHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Captures an active hold by debiting the final amount (which may be less than
or equal to the held amount). Any difference is released back to available balance.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.ReleaseHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.ReleaseHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Releases an active hold, making all held funds available again.
No debit occurs.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.CurrencyClient.GetHoldAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Currency.GetHoldRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves the current status and details of an authorization hold.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.IEscrowClient.DepositAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.DepositRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deposit assets into escrow. Transfers currency from party's own wallet to that
party's escrow wallet. Moves items from party's own container to that party's
escrow container. Locks contracts with escrow as guardian.
Rejects soulbound/non-tradeable items. After each deposit, queries bound contract
to check if all asset requirements are satisfied.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowType
member.summary:
Type of escrow agreement.
- two_party: Simple trade escrow between Party A and Party B
- multi_party: N parties with complex deposit/receive rules
- conditional: Release based on external condition or contract fulfillment
- auction: Winner-takes-all with refunds to losers

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowStatus
member.summary:
Current status of the escrow agreement.
- pending_deposits: Waiting for parties to deposit
- partially_funded: Some but not all deposits received
- funded: All deposits received, awaiting consent/condition
- pending_consent: Some consents received, waiting for more
- pending_condition: Waiting for contract fulfillment or external verification
- finalizing: Running contract finalizer prebound APIs (transient)
- releasing: Release in progress (transient)
- released: Assets transferred to recipients
- refunding: Refund in progress (transient)
- refunded: Assets returned to depositors
- disputed: In dispute, arbiter must resolve
- expired: Timed out without completion
- cancelled: Cancelled before funding complete
- validation_failed: Held assets changed, awaiting re-affirmation

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowTrustMode
member.summary:
Trust model for the escrow agreement.
- full_consent: All parties must explicitly consent using tokens
- initiator_trusted: The service that created the escrow can complete unilaterally
- single_party_trusted: A designated party can complete unilaterally

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowPartyRole
member.summary:
Role of a party in the escrow.
- depositor: Deposits assets into escrow
- recipient: Receives assets when released
- depositor_recipient: Both deposits and can receive (typical for trades)
- arbiter: Can resolve disputes, does not deposit or receive
- observer: Can view status but cannot act

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowConsentType
member.summary:
Type of consent being given.
- release: Agrees to release assets to recipients
- refund: Agrees to refund assets to depositors
- dispute: Raises a dispute
- reaffirm: Re-affirms after validation failure

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowResolution
member.summary:
How the escrow was resolved.
- released: Assets went to designated recipients
- refunded: Assets returned to depositors
- split: Arbiter split assets between parties
- expired_refunded: Timed out, auto-refunded
- cancelled_refunded: Cancelled, deposits refunded
- violation_refunded: Validation failure caused refund

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.AssetType
member.summary:
Type of asset held in escrow.
- currency: Currency amount held in escrow wallet
- item: Item instance held in escrow container
- item_stack: Stackable items (quantity) held in escrow container
- contract: Contract instance locked under escrow guardianship
- custom: Custom asset type via registered handler

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ValidationFailureType
member.summary:
Type of validation failure detected.
- asset_missing: Asset no longer exists in escrow custody
- asset_mutated: Asset properties changed (e.g., item durability)
- asset_expired: Asset has a time-based expiration that triggered
- balance_mismatch: Wallet balance does not match expected held amount

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.TokenAlgorithm
member.summary:
Algorithm used for token generation.
- hmac_sha256: HMAC-SHA256 based tokens
- random_bytes: Cryptographically random tokens

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.TokenType
member.summary:
Type of token being requested.
- deposit: Token for depositing assets
- release: Token for consenting to release

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ReleaseMode
member.summary:
Controls how release confirmation is handled:
- immediate: Finalizing Released (skip Releasing state entirely).
WARNING: Use only for trusted/low-value scenarios (NPC vendors, system rewards).
Assets are marked as released BEFORE downstream services confirm transfers.
If downstream services fail, manual intervention may be required.
- service_only: Wait for downstream services (currency, inventory) to confirm transfers complete.
- party_required: Wait for all parties to call /confirm-release.
- service_and_party: Wait for both service completion AND party confirmation.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.RefundMode
member.summary:
Controls how refund confirmation is handled. Same semantics as ReleaseMode.
Refunds typically use 'immediate' since parties get their own assets back.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.ConfirmationTimeoutBehavior
member.summary:
What happens when confirmation timeout expires:
- auto_confirm: If service events received, auto-confirm parties (default).
- dispute: Transition to Disputed state, require arbiter intervention.
- refund: Treat as failed, transition to Refunding.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.TrustedPartyId
member.summary: For single_party_trusted - which party has authority

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.InitiatorServiceId
member.summary: For initiator_trusted - which service created this

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.Parties
member.summary: All parties involved in the escrow

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.ExpectedDeposits
member.summary: What deposits are expected from each party

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.ReleaseAllocations
member.summary: How assets should be distributed on release

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.BoundContractId
member.summary: Contract governing conditions for this escrow

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.RequiredConsentsForRelease
member.summary: How many parties must consent for release (-1 = all required)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.LastValidatedAt
member.summary: When the escrow was last validated

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Escrow.EscrowAgreement.FundedAt
member.summary: When all expected deposits were received

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send chat message to game session

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Perform game action (enhanced permissions after joining)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.JoinGameSessionByIdAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.JoinGameSessionByIdRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join a specific game session by ID
member.remarks:
Join a game session by its session ID. Used for matchmade games where the session
is pre-created by the matchmaking service and the player has a reservation.
For matchmade sessions, a valid reservation token is required.
For lobby sessions, this allows joining by ID without going through gameType lookup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.LeaveGameSessionByIdAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.LeaveGameSessionByIdRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Leave a specific game session by ID
member.remarks:
Leave a game session by its session ID. This is the session-specific alternative
to /sessions/leave which uses gameType. Useful for matchmade sessions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.IGameSessionClient.PublishJoinShortcutAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.PublishJoinShortcutRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Publish join shortcut for matchmade session
member.remarks:
Internal endpoint for the matchmaking service to trigger shortcut publishing
to a specific player for a matchmade session. The shortcut allows the player
to join the session with their reservation token pre-bound.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.GameSession.VoiceConnectionInfo
member.summary:
Minimal voice metadata returned when joining a session.
**Event-Only Pattern**: Peer connection details are NOT included here.
Clients receive VoicePeerJoinedEvent when other peers join (with their SDP offers).
This avoids race conditions between response processing and event handling.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Inventory service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.CreateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.CreateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new container with the specified constraint model and capacity.
Container types are game-defined strings (e.g., "inventory", "bank", "equipment_slot").

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.GetContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.GetContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves a container by ID, optionally including its contents.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.GetOrCreateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.GetOrCreateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get container or create if not exists
member.remarks:
Enables lazy container creation for character inventories.
If a container doesn't exist for the owner/type combination, creates it
with the specified defaults.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.ListContainersAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.ListContainersRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Returns all containers owned by the specified entity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.UpdateContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.UpdateContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Updates mutable container properties like capacity limits and filtering.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.DeleteContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.DeleteContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deletes a container. Must specify how to handle existing contents:
destroy, transfer to another container, or error if not empty.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.AddItemToContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.AddItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Adds an item instance to a container. Validates container constraints
(slots, weight, grid, category filters). For stackable items, may
merge with existing stacks.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.RemoveItemFromContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.RemoveItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes an item from its container. The item still exists but has no
container assignment. Use destroy via lib-item to permanently delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.MoveItemAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.MoveItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Move item to different slot or container
member.remarks:
Moves an item within the same container (slot change) or to a different
container. Validates destination constraints. For equipment slots, this
effectively equips/unequips items.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.TransferItemAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.TransferItemRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Transfers an item to a container owned by a different entity.
Used for trades, gifts, and loot distribution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.SplitStackAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.SplitStackRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Splits a stack of items into two stacks. The original stack keeps the
remainder, and a new stack is created with the split quantity.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.MergeStacksAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.MergeStacksRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Merges two stacks of the same item template. The source stack is
destroyed and its quantity added to the target stack.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.QueryItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.QueryItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Searches for items across all containers owned by an entity.
Can filter by template, category, tags, and other criteria.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.CountItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.CountItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Counts total quantity of a specific item template across containers.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.HasItemsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.HasItemsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if entity has required items
member.remarks:
Checks if an entity has the required quantities of specified items.
Used for crafting and quest requirements validation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.IInventoryClient.FindSpaceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Inventory.FindSpaceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Finds available space for an item in the owner's containers.
Returns candidate containers and slots where the item could be placed.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Item service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.CreateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.CreateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new item definition for a game. Code, gameId, quantityModel, and scope
are immutable after creation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.GetItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.GetItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get item template by ID or code
member.remarks:
Retrieves an item template by its unique ID or by code+gameId combination.
At least one of templateId or (code + gameId) must be provided.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ListItemTemplatesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ListItemTemplatesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Lists item templates with optional filtering by gameId, category, tags,
rarity, scope, and active status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.UpdateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.UpdateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update mutable fields of an item template
member.remarks:
Updates mutable fields of an item template. Code, gameId, quantityModel, and scope
are immutable after creation and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.DeprecateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.DeprecateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Marks an item template as deprecated. Deprecated templates cannot be used
to create new instances but existing instances remain valid. Optionally
specify a migration target template.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.CreateItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.CreateItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new item instance from a template. The instance must be placed
in a container (containerId required). Use lib-inventory's /inventory/add
for most use cases - this endpoint is for low-level instance creation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.GetItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.GetItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves an item instance by its unique ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ModifyItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ModifyItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Modifies an item instance's mutable state: durability, custom stats,
custom name, and metadata. Cannot modify bound items unless admin.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.BindItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.BindItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Binds an item instance to a character. The bind type must be allowed by
the template's soulboundType. Once bound, the item cannot be traded.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.UnbindItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.UnbindItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes the binding from a soulbound item. This is an admin-only operation
for returning bound items to tradeable state. Requires a reason for audit trail.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.DestroyItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.DestroyItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Permanently destroys an item instance. The reason is recorded for audit.
Cannot destroy bound items unless admin or reason is 'admin'.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ListItemsByContainerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ListItemsByContainerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Returns all item instances in the specified container.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.IItemClient.ListItemsByTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ListItemsByTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

rarity, scope, and active status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.UpdateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.UpdateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Update mutable fields of an item template
member.remarks:
Updates mutable fields of an item template. Code, gameId, quantityModel, and scope
are immutable after creation and cannot be changed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.DeprecateItemTemplateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.DeprecateItemTemplateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Marks an item template as deprecated. Deprecated templates cannot be used
to create new instances but existing instances remain valid. Optionally
specify a migration target template.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.CreateItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.CreateItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new item instance from a template. The instance must be placed
in a container (containerId required). Use lib-inventory's /inventory/add
for most use cases - this endpoint is for low-level instance creation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.GetItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.GetItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Retrieves an item instance by its unique ID.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.ModifyItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ModifyItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Modifies an item instance's mutable state: durability, custom stats,
custom name, and metadata. Cannot modify bound items unless admin.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.BindItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.BindItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Binds an item instance to a character. The bind type must be allowed by
the template's soulboundType. Once bound, the item cannot be traded.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.UnbindItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.UnbindItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes the binding from a soulbound item. This is an admin-only operation
for returning bound items to tradeable state. Requires a reason for audit trail.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.ItemClient.DestroyItemInstanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Item.DestroyItemInstanceRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Permanently destroys an item instance. The reason is recorded for audit.
Cannot destroy bound items unless admin or reason is 'admin'.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListLocationsByRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListLocationsByRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List all locations in a realm (primary query pattern)
member.remarks:
Returns all locations within a specific realm, optionally filtered by
location type and parent. This is the primary access pattern for
realm-scoped location queries.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListLocationsByParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListLocationsByParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get child locations for a parent location
member.remarks:
Retrieve all locations that have the specified location as their parent.
Useful for getting all cities in a region, all buildings in a city, etc.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.ListRootLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ListRootLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get root locations in a realm
member.remarks:
Returns all top-level locations in a realm (locations with no parent).
These are typically regions or major areas within the realm.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationAncestorsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationAncestorsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all ancestors of a location
member.remarks:
Returns the full ancestry chain from the specified location up to the
root location (parentLocationId=null). For example, for a specific building
might return [district, city, region].

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.GetLocationDescendantsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.GetLocationDescendantsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get all descendants of a location
member.remarks:
Returns all locations that are descendants of the specified location
(direct children, grandchildren, etc.). Useful for finding all places
within a region or city.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.CreateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.CreateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.UpdateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.UpdateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SetLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SetLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Set or change the parent of a location
member.remarks:
Update a location's parent, moving it in the hierarchy.
Validates that:
- New parent exists and is in the same realm
- No circular reference would be created
- Updates depth for location and all descendants

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.RemoveLocationParentAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.RemoveLocationParentRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Remove parent from a location (make it a root location)
member.remarks:
Remove the parent of a location, making it a top-level root location
within its realm. Updates depth for location and all descendants.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeleteLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeleteLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Hard delete a location. This will fail if the location:
- Has child locations (must delete or reparent children first)
- Is still referenced by other entities
For safe removal, first deprecate the location, remove all children,
then delete.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.DeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.DeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a location by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated locations:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for placing new entities
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.UndeprecateLocationAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.UndeprecateLocationRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a location, making it
available for entity placement again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.LocationExistsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.LocationExistsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Check if location exists and is active
member.remarks:
Fast validation endpoint for other services to check location validity.
Returns true if location exists and is not deprecated, false otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.ILocationClient.SeedLocationsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Location.SeedLocationsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed locations from provided data.
Creates locations that don't exist, optionally updates existing locations.
Processes locations in dependency order (parents before children).
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined location hierarchies.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient
member.summary: Client interface for the Mapping service. Provides strongly-typed methods for invoking service endpoints via the mesh infrastructure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CreateChannelAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateChannelRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create a new map channel and become its authority
member.remarks:
Creates a new region+kind channel and grants authority to caller.
Returns ingestTopic for high-throughput event publishing.
If channel already exists with active authority, returns Conflict.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ReleaseAuthorityAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.ReleaseAuthorityRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Voluntarily releases authority. Channel becomes unassigned.
Only the current authority can release.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.AuthorityHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthorityHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Keep-alive for authority. Must be called periodically (default every 30s).
Failure to heartbeat results in authority expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.PublishMapUpdateAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishMapUpdateRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push authoritative spatial updates.
Validates authority token, stores update, and broadcasts to consumers.
For high-throughput scenarios, use event publishing via ingestTopic instead.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.PublishObjectChangesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.PublishObjectChangesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Game servers use this to push object state changes.
Efficiently batches multiple object changes into one event.
Max 100 changes per request.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.RequestSnapshotAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.RequestSnapshotRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Request full snapshot for cold start
member.remarks:
Consumers use this when starting up to get initial state.
Returns current snapshot of requested region/kinds.
For very large maps, payloadRef points to lib-asset storage.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryPointAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryPointRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Query map data at a specific point
member.remarks:
Returns all map data at a point across requested kinds.
Used by behavior stacks for contextual decisions.
Optionally includes objects within radius.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryBoundsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryBoundsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Returns map data within a bounding box.
For event actors needing region overview.
Limited to maxObjects per kind.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryObjectsByTypeAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.QueryObjectsByTypeRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find all objects of a type in region
member.remarks:
Returns all objects matching an objectType filter.
For event actors asking "where are all the boulder clusters?"

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.QueryAffordanceAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AffordanceQueryRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Find locations that afford a specific action or scene type
member.remarks:
Affordance queries answer "where can I do X?" by combining
multiple map kinds and applying game-specific scoring logic.
Used by Event Brain for procedural scene orchestration:
- "Find ambush locations"
- "Find dramatic reveal spots"
- "Find sheltered rest areas"
Well-known types have predefined scoring; use affordanceType=custom
with customAffordance for novel scenarios.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CheckoutForAuthoringAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthoringCheckoutRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Acquire exclusive edit lock for design-time editing
member.remarks:
For level editors and design tools only.
Game servers do NOT use this - they use create-channel for implicit authority.
Returns authority token for publishing edits.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CommitAuthoringAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthoringCommitRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Commits pending changes and releases the checkout lock.
Optionally includes a commit message for history.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ReleaseAuthoringAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.AuthoringReleaseRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Discards pending changes and releases the checkout lock.
Use when abandoning edits.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.CreateDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Creates a new map definition (template) that describes the structure
of a region. Definitions are templates that can be used to bootstrap
channels with predefined layer configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.GetDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.GetDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Get a map definition by ID
member.remarks: Returns the full map definition including all layer configurations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.ListDefinitionsAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.ListDefinitionsRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: List map definitions with optional filters
member.remarks: Returns a paginated list of map definitions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.UpdateDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.UpdateDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Updates an existing map definition. Cannot change the definition ID.
Layer configurations can be modified.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.IMappingClient.DeleteDefinitionAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.DeleteDefinitionRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Deletes a map definition. Cannot delete if active channels reference it.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Mapping.CreateChannelRequest.TakeoverMode
member.summary:
Policy for authority takeover when channel exists with expired authority.

reset: Clear all channel data before new authority takes over.
require_consume: New authority must call RequestSnapshot before publishing.
