member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.DeleteSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.DeleteSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Hard delete a species. This will fail if the species is still in use.
For safe removal, first deprecate the species, then merge it into another species
(or VOID), then delete. Only deprecated species with zero references can be deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.DeprecateSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.DeprecateSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Soft-delete a species by marking it as deprecated.
Deprecated species:
- Remain queryable for historical data
- Cannot be used for creating new characters
- Can be merged into other species using the merge endpoint
- Can be hard-deleted after all references are removed

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.UndeprecateSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.UndeprecateSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Remove the deprecated status from a species, making it
available for new characters again.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.MergeSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.MergeSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Merge a deprecated species into another species
member.remarks:
Migrate all characters using a deprecated species to a target species.
This is the recommended way to handle species removal:
1. Deprecate the source species
2. Merge into the target species (or VOID for effective deletion)
3. Optionally hard-delete the now-empty deprecated species
The merge operation:
- Updates all characters using sourceSpeciesId to use targetSpeciesId
- Publishes events for each affected character
- Returns count of migrated characters
- Fails if source is not deprecated (safety check)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.AddSpeciesToRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.AddSpeciesToRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Make a species available in an additional realm

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.RemoveSpeciesFromRealmAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.RemoveSpeciesFromRealmRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks: Remove a species from a realm (species must not have characters in that realm)

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SpeciesClient.SeedSpeciesAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Species.SeedSpeciesRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Idempotent operation to seed species from provided data.
Creates species that don't exist, optionally updates existing species.
Typically called at service startup with YAML-defined species.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.CreateVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.CreateVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create voice room for a game session
member.remarks:
Creates a new voice room associated with a game session.
Called by GameSession service when creating a session with voice enabled.
Returns room ID and initial configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.GetVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.GetVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves current state of a voice room including participant list.
Called by GameSession service to check room status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.JoinVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.JoinVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join voice room and register SIP endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers a participant's SIP endpoint with the voice room.
Called by GameSession service when a player joins a session.
Returns connection info and current peer list for P2P mode,
or RTP server details for scaled mode.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.LeaveVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.LeaveVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes a participant from the voice room and notifies other peers.
Called by GameSession service when a player leaves a session.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.DeleteVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.DeleteVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deletes a voice room and notifies all participants.
Called by GameSession service when a session is deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.PeerHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.PeerHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Refreshes the TTL for a participant's endpoint registration.
Should be called periodically to prevent endpoint expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.IVoiceClient.AnswerPeerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.AnswerPeerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send SDP answer to complete WebRTC handshake
member.remarks:
Called by clients after receiving a VoicePeerJoinedEvent containing an SDP offer.
The client generates an SDP answer and sends it via this endpoint.
The answering peer is notified via VoicePeerUpdatedEvent.
**Access Control**: This endpoint requires the `voice:ringing` state, which is
automatically set by the Voice service when a VoicePeerJoinedEvent is sent to the client.
The state is cleared after the answer is processed or times out.

member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Create voice room for a game session
member.remarks:
Creates a new voice room associated with a game session.
Called by GameSession service when creating a session with voice enabled.
Returns room ID and initial configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.GetVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.GetVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Retrieves current state of a voice room including participant list.
Called by GameSession service to check room status.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.JoinVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.JoinVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Join voice room and register SIP endpoint
member.remarks:
Registers a participant's SIP endpoint with the voice room.
Called by GameSession service when a player joins a session.
Returns connection info and current peer list for P2P mode,
or RTP server details for scaled mode.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.LeaveVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.LeaveVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Removes a participant from the voice room and notifies other peers.
Called by GameSession service when a player leaves a session.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.DeleteVoiceRoomAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.DeleteVoiceRoomRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Deletes a voice room and notifies all participants.
Called by GameSession service when a session is deleted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.PeerHeartbeatAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.PeerHeartbeatRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.remarks:
Refreshes the TTL for a participant's endpoint registration.
Should be called periodically to prevent endpoint expiration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.VoiceClient.AnswerPeerAsync(BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Voice.AnswerPeerRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.param: A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
member.summary: Send SDP answer to complete WebRTC handshake
member.remarks:
Called by clients after receiving a VoicePeerJoinedEvent containing an SDP offer.
The client generates an SDP answer and sends it via this endpoint.
The answering peer is notified via VoicePeerUpdatedEvent.
**Access Control**: This endpoint requires the `voice:ringing` state, which is
automatically set by the Voice service when a VoicePeerJoinedEvent is sent to the client.
The state is cleared after the answer is processed or times out.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ContractExecutedEvent
member.summary:
Event published when contract clauses are executed (distributions made).
Provides per-clause distribution results for escrow verification, enabling
lib-escrow to correlate outcomes with its template value mappings and handle
partial failures appropriately.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ContractExecutedEvent.DistributionResults
member.summary:
Per-clause distribution outcomes for escrow verification.
Escrow correlates these via clauseId to the template values it set,
enabling proper handling of partial failures without requiring
wallet/container IDs in the event payload.

Permission requirement mapping role and state to endpoint access.

T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceHeartbeatEvent
member.summary:
Published periodically by each bannou instance to indicate health and capacity.
Contains aggregated information for ALL services hosted by this app instance.
Used for load balancing and service discovery by the orchestrator.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceHeartbeatEvent.ServiceId
member.summary: Unique GUID identifying this bannou instance (for log correlation/debugging)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceHeartbeatEvent.Status
member.summary: Overall instance health status (worst of all services + app-level issues)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceHeartbeatEvent.Services
member.summary: Status of each service/plugin hosted by this instance

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceHeartbeatEvent.Capacity
member.summary: Capacity and load information for this instance

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceHeartbeatEvent.Issues
member.summary: List of current issues affecting this instance

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceStatus
member.summary: Status of an individual service/plugin within an app instance

member.summary: Unique GUID identifying this plugin instance (for log correlation/debugging)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.InstanceCapacity.MaxConnections
member.summary: Maximum connections this instance can handle

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent
member.summary:
Structured error event for unexpected service failures (akin to Sentry).
Use ONLY for internal faults, not for user/input errors.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.ServiceId
member.summary: Unique GUID identifying this plugin instance (for log correlation/debugging)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.ServiceName
member.summary: Logical service name emitting the error (e.g., "account")

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.AppId
member.summary: Bannou app-id of the instance emitting the error

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.Operation
member.summary: Operation/method name where the error occurred

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.CorrelationId
member.summary: Correlation ID / request ID, if available

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.Dependency
member.summary: Dependency implicated in the failure (e.g., redis, pubsub, http:account)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.ServiceErrorEvent.Stack
member.summary: Optional stack trace for debugging (avoid PII)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent
member.summary:
Published periodically by Orchestrator as the authoritative source of truth
for all service-to-app-id mappings across the entire network.
Consumed by all bannou instances to atomically update their routing tables.
Published every 30 seconds AND immediately when routing changes.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.Mappings
member.summary: Complete dictionary of serviceName -> appId mappings

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.Version
member.summary: Monotonically increasing version for ordering. Consumers reject events with version <= current.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.SourceInstanceId
member.summary: Orchestrator instance GUID that published this event

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FullServiceMappingsEvent.TotalServices
member.summary: Total number of services in the mappings dictionary

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket connection is fully established.
This event ensures the RabbitMQ exchange exists before any service publishes
to the session-specific topic (CONNECT_SESSION_{sessionId}).
Permission service uses this to track activeConnections and compile capabilities.
The roles and authorizations enable event-driven capability compilation without
synchronous API calls from Connect to Permission.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.SessionId
member.summary: Session ID that just connected via WebSocket

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.Roles
member.summary: User roles from JWT (e.g., ["user", "admin"]). Used by Permission to compile capabilities.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.Authorizations
member.summary: Authorization states from JWT (e.g., ["my-game:authorized"]). Format is "serviceId:state".

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.ConnectInstanceId
member.summary: Connect service instance handling this connection (for debugging)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionConnectedEvent.PeerGuid
member.summary:
Unique GUID for peer-to-peer routing. Other connections on the same Connect node
can route messages directly to this connection using this GUID with the Client flag.
Enables zero-copy message forwarding between Game Servers, Actor Pool Nodes, and clients.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket connection is closed.
Used by Permission service to remove session from activeConnections.
Also enables cleanup of session-specific resources across services.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.Reconnectable
member.summary: Whether session can reconnect within the reconnection window

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionDisconnectedEvent.DurationSeconds
member.summary: How long the session was connected (for metrics)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent
member.summary:
Published by Connect service when a WebSocket session is restored after reconnection.
Services should subscribe to this event to re-publish any session shortcuts they
previously granted, as shortcuts are cleared on disconnect and do not persist.
**Session Shortcuts Re-publication:**
Services that publish session shortcuts should listen for this event and re-evaluate
whether the session should receive shortcuts again (e.g., check subscription status,
game state, etc.) and publish new ShortcutPublishedEvents as appropriate.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.AccountId
member.summary: Account ID owning the reconnected session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.Roles
member.summary: User roles preserved from previous session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.Authorizations
member.summary: Authorization states preserved from previous session

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.PreviousDisconnectAt
member.summary: When the previous connection was lost

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.PeerGuid
member.summary:
New peer GUID for this reconnected session. Note: This is a NEW GUID -
peer GUIDs do not persist across reconnections. Peers must be notified
of the new GUID to continue peer-to-peer routing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.SessionReconnectedEvent.ReconnectionContext
member.summary: Optional context from the reconnection (client info, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.CharacterStateUpdateEvent
member.summary:
Published by Actor service when an actor updates a character's behavioral state.
Game servers subscribe to receive state updates for characters they manage.
This is NOT physics data (position, velocity) - that's Game Server territory.
This is intent/emotional/goal state that the character's behavior stack reads as input.
Note: Game servers have no knowledge of actors - they only see character state.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.CharacterStateUpdateEvent.ActorId
member.summary: Actor that produced this update (opaque to Game Server)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.CharacterStateUpdateEvent.Feelings
member.summary: Emotional state values for the character

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.CharacterStateUpdateEvent.BehaviorChange
member.summary: Changes to the character's behavior composition

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.FeelingState
member.summary:
Emotional state values (0.0 - 1.0 intensity).
The character's behavior stack reads these as inputs to influence decisions.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.GoalState
member.summary:
Goal state for the character.
Primary goal drives major decisions, secondary goals run in background.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.GoalState.GoalParameters
member.summary: Parameters for the primary goal (e.g., target entity, location)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.MemoryUpdate
member.summary:
A single memory update operation (add, remove, or modify).
Memories affect character behavior through recall during cognition.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.MemoryUpdate.MemoryValue
member.summary: Memory value (entity ID, context, intensity, etc.)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.BehaviorCompositionChange
member.summary:
Changes to the character's behavior composition.
RARE - only happens during learning/growth events.
The character's behavior stack is self-sufficient; these changes add new capabilities.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.BannouService.Events.BehaviorCompositionChange.Added
member.summary: Behavior IDs added to composition (e.g., learned skills)

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes
member.summary: Response codes used in the binary WebSocket protocol for success/error indication. These codes are returned in the response header's ResponseCode field.
member.remarks: Codes 0-49 are protocol-level errors (Connect service). Codes 50-69 are service-level errors (downstream service responses). Codes 70+ are shortcut-specific errors.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.RequestError
member.summary: Generic request error (malformed message, invalid format).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.RequestTooLarge
member.summary: Request payload exceeds maximum allowed size.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.TooManyRequests
member.summary: Rate limit exceeded for this client/session.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.InvalidRequestChannel
member.summary: Invalid channel number in request header.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.TextProtocolNotSupported
member.summary: Text WebSocket frame received; binary protocol required after AUTH.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.Unauthorized
member.summary: Authentication required but not provided or invalid.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.ServiceNotFound
member.summary: Target service GUID not found in capability manifest.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.ClientNotFound
member.summary: Target client GUID not found (for client-to-client messages).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.BroadcastNotAllowed
member.summary: Broadcast not allowed in this connection mode (External mode blocks broadcast).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.ShortcutExpired
member.summary: Shortcut has expired and is no longer valid.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Client.ResponseCodes.ShortcutTargetNotFound
member.summary: Shortcut target endpoint no longer exists.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for behavior evaluators providing common merge logic. Game extends this with entity system specifics.

remarks.para: This base class handles: - Model cache management - Intent merging for all 4 model types - Output buffer allocation
Game-specific implementation provides: - Which models are active per character - How to get character-specific variant preferences - How to populate the shared input state

member.summary: The model cache for interpreter lookup.

member.summary: Pre-allocated output buffer to avoid per-frame allocation. Size is 15 slots: 5 channels * 2 slots + 5 extra slots for targets/positions.

member.summary: Creates a new behavior evaluator with the specified cache.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.IsModelActive(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Determines if a behavior model type is active for a character.
member.param: The behavior model type to check.
member.returns: True if the model should be evaluated, false to skip.

remarks.para: Override this to implement game-specific activation logic. For example: - Combat model only active when in combat - Interaction model only active near interactable objects - Idle model always active but with low urgency
Default implementation returns true for all model types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorEvaluatorBase.GetPreferredVariant(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Gets the preferred variant for a character/type combination.
member.returns: Variant name, or null for default.

remarks.para: Override this to implement game-specific variant selection. For example: - Combat variant based on equipped weapon type - Movement variant based on mount state - Interaction variant based on character class
Default implementation returns null (uses default variant).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache
member.summary: Caches behavior model interpreters per (character, type, variant) combination. Supports fallback chains for variant selection.

remarks.para: Models are registered by type and variant name (e.g., "sword-and-shield" combat). When requesting an interpreter, the cache checks the fallback chain to find the best available variant.
Example fallback chain for combat: ["sword-and-shield", "one-handed", "default"] If character requests "sword-and-shield" and it's not registered, falls back to "one-handed", then "default".
Thread-safety: The cache uses ConcurrentDictionary for thread-safe access. Individual interpreter instances are NOT thread-safe - each character should have its own interpreter.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache.DefaultVariant
member.summary: Default variant name used when no variant is specified.

member.summary: Registers a behavior model for a specific type and variant.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache.UnregisterModel(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType,System.String)
member.returns: True if the model was removed, false if not found.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache.GetModel(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a registered model by type and variant.
member.returns: The model if registered, null otherwise.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache.SetFallbackChain(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType,System.String[])
member.summary: Sets the fallback chain for variant selection.
member.param: Ordered list of variant names to try.

remarks.para: Example: SetFallbackChain(Combat, ["sword-and-shield", "one-handed", "default"])
When GetInterpreter is called with variant "sword-and-shield" but it's not registered, the cache will try "one-handed", then "default".

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.BehaviorModelCache.GetFallbackChain(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Gets the fallback chain for a behavior model type.
member.returns: The fallback chain, or a single-element array with "default".

member.returns: The interpreter, or null if no matching model is registered.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator
member.summary: Interface for evaluating behavior models per character. Game implements this to integrate with its entity/component system.

remarks.para: The SDK provides IntentMerger and BehaviorEvaluatorBase, but the game is responsible for: - Managing which models are active per character - Providing the shared input state (game state) - Applying the MergedIntent to animations/physics - Calling EvaluateCharacter each frame

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.EvaluateCharacter(System.Guid,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates all active behavior models for a character and returns the merged intent.
member.param: Current game state as input values.
member.returns: Merged intent from all active behavior models.

remarks.para: The sharedInputState contains values like: - Character health, stamina, position - Nearby enemy positions and states - Current equipped items - Environment conditions
All 4 model types (combat, movement, interaction, idle) are evaluated if active, then merged using urgency-based resolution.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.InvalidateModel(System.Guid,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType)
member.summary: Invalidates a cached model when it needs to be reloaded.
member.param: The behavior model type to invalidate.

remarks.para: Call this when: - Character equips new weapon (combat model may change) - Character's class changes (all models may change) - Model is hot-reloaded during development

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.IBehaviorEvaluator.InvalidateAllModels(System.Guid)
member.summary: Invalidates all cached models for a character.
member.remarks: Call this when a character is respawned or their configuration changes significantly.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent
member.summary: Attention intent with blendable gaze targets.

remarks.para: Unlike simple exclusive channels, attention supports "blending" by providing multiple targets with weights. The game's animation system can then interpolate gaze direction between targets based on their weights.

Since entity IDs (Guids) cannot be mathematically blended, this struct provides primary and secondary targets with urgency-derived weights. The game resolves entity positions and performs actual gaze interpolation.
Example: Combat model wants to watch the threat (urgency 0.8), Movement model wants to look at the path ahead (urgency 0.4). Game blends gaze 67% toward threat, 33% toward path.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.PrimaryTarget
member.summary: Primary attention target entity (highest urgency contributor). Null if no attention targets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.PrimaryUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the primary attention target [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.SecondaryTarget
member.summary: Secondary attention target entity (second-highest urgency contributor). Null if only one model contributed attention.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.SecondaryUrgency
member.summary: Urgency of the secondary attention target [0.0 - 1.0].

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.BlendWeight
member.summary: Blend weight for primary target [0.0 - 1.0]. The game should blend gaze: BlendWeight toward primary, (1-BlendWeight) toward secondary. If no secondary target, this will be 1.0.
member.remarks: Calculated as: PrimaryUrgency / (PrimaryUrgency + SecondaryUrgency)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.TotalUrgency
member.summary: Combined urgency for animation transition speed.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.None
member.summary: Empty attention intent (not looking at anything specific).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.IsValid
member.summary: Whether this intent has a valid attention target.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.HasSecondaryTarget
member.summary: Whether this intent has multiple targets to blend between.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.CreateSingle(System.Guid,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates an attention intent with a single target (no blending needed).
member.param: The target entity to look at.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.AttentionIntent.CreateBlended(System.Guid,System.Single,System.Guid,System.Single)
member.summary: Creates an attention intent with two blended targets.
member.returns: A new AttentionIntent instance with calculated blend weight.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput
member.summary: Structured output from a single behavior model evaluation. Extracted from raw output buffer based on IntentSlotLayout conventions.

remarks.para: Each behavior model (combat, movement, interaction, idle) produces one BehaviorOutput. The IntentMerger combines these into a single MergedIntent.

Output extraction uses the standardized slot layout: - Slots 0-1: Action intent + urgency - Slots 2-3: Locomotion intent + urgency - Slots 4-5: Attention target + urgency - Slots 6-7: Stance intent + urgency - Slots 8-9: Vocalization intent + urgency - Slots 10-12: Locomotion target Vector3 (optional) - Slot 13: Action target entity ID (optional) - Slot 14: Attention target entity ID (optional)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionIntent
member.summary: Action intent name (e.g., "attack", "block", "use", "talk"). Null if no action output.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionUrgency
member.summary: Action channel urgency [0.0 - 1.0]. Higher urgency wins in conflict resolution.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.ActionTarget
member.summary: Target entity for the action (e.g., attack target, item to pick up). Null if action doesn't require a target.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.LocomotionIntent
member.summary: Locomotion intent name (e.g., "walk_to", "run_away", "strafe"). Null if no locomotion output.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.LocomotionUrgency
member.summary: Locomotion channel urgency [0.0 - 1.0]. Used for blending when multiple models contribute locomotion.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.LocomotionTarget
member.summary: Target position for locomotion in world space. Null if locomotion doesn't specify a target.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.AttentionTarget
member.summary: Target entity for attention/gaze direction. Null if not looking at a specific entity.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.AttentionUrgency
member.summary: Attention channel urgency [0.0 - 1.0]. Higher urgency overrides lower urgency attention targets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.StanceIntent
member.summary: Stance intent name (e.g., "combat_ready", "defensive", "relaxed"). Null if no stance change.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput.VocalizationIntent
member.summary: Vocalization intent name (e.g., "battle_cry", "greeting", "pain"). Null if no vocalization.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType
member.summary: The fixed set of behavior model types for multi-model coordination. Each character can have up to 4 simultaneously-active behavior models.

remarks.para: These are intentionally fixed (not configurable) for simplicity. The IntentMerger knows how to blend outputs from these 4 model types.

Mapping to IntentChannels: - Any model can emit to any channel - Combat typically emits to Action, Stance - Movement emits to Locomotion - Interaction emits to Action, Attention - Idle emits to all channels with low urgency

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentSlotLayout
member.summary: Output slot layout convention for EmitIntent opcode. Each intent channel uses 2 consecutive output slots: [action_index, urgency].

remarks.para:
Output buffer layout (10 slots minimum):
[0] Action intent (string table index) [1] Action urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [2] Locomotion intent (string table index) [3] Locomotion urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [4] Attention target (entity ID or 0) [5] Attention urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [6] Stance intent (string table index) [7] Stance urgency (0.0 - 1.0) [8] Vocalization intent (string table index) [9] Vocalization urgency (0.0 - 1.0)
Extended slots (10+) can be used for: - Locomotion target position (Vector3: slots 10-12) - Action target entity (slot 13) - Additional channel-specific data

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger
member.summary: Merges behavior outputs from multiple models using urgency-based resolution.

remarks.para: Each character can have up to 4 simultaneously-active behavior models. The IntentMerger resolves which model's output wins for each channel.

Resolution strategies: - Exclusive channels (Action, Stance, Vocalization): Highest urgency wins - Blendable channels (Locomotion): Weighted blend by urgency - Attention: Blendable (outputs primary/secondary targets with weights for gaze interpolation)
Zero-urgency outputs are ignored (model didn't emit for that channel).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.UrgencyThreshold
member.summary: Minimum urgency threshold. Outputs below this are treated as zero.
Merge outputs from all active behavior models into a single MergedIntent.
member.param: Output from combat behavior model (may be null).
Output from movement behavior model (may be null).
Output from interaction behavior model (may be null).
Output from idle behavior model (may be null).
member.returns: Merged intent for game engine consumption.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.SelectExclusiveAction(System.ValueTuple{System.Nullable{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput},BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType}[])
member.summary: Selects the action with highest urgency.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.BlendLocomotion(System.ValueTuple{System.Nullable{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput},BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType}[])
member.summary: Blends locomotion from all contributors weighted by urgency.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.BlendAttention(System.ValueTuple{System.Nullable{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput},BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType}[])
member.summary: Blends attention from all contributors, outputting primary and secondary targets with weights.
member.remarks: Entity IDs (Guids) cannot be mathematically blended, so we output the top two contributors with their urgency-derived weights. The game resolves entity positions and performs actual gaze interpolation.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.SelectExclusiveStance(System.ValueTuple{System.Nullable{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput},BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType}[])
member.summary: Selects the stance with highest urgency.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.IntentMerger.SelectExclusiveVocalization(System.ValueTuple{System.Nullable{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorOutput},BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.BehaviorModelType}[])
member.summary: Selects the vocalization with highest urgency.
Collects contributions for debugging from all outputs.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.LocomotionIntent
member.summary: Locomotion intent with blendable target position.

remarks.para: Unlike other intent channels which are exclusive (highest urgency wins), locomotion can blend multiple contributors weighted by urgency.
Example: Combat model wants to strafe left (urgency 0.8), Movement model wants to walk forward (urgency 0.4). Result: diagonal movement weighted toward strafing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.LocomotionIntent.Speed
member.summary: Normalized movement speed multiplier [0.0 - 1.0]. 0.0 = stationary, 1.0 = maximum speed for this intent.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.LocomotionIntent.Urgency
member.summary: Combined urgency of all contributing locomotion intents. Used by animation system to determine transition speed.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.LocomotionIntent.IsValid

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent
member.summary: The merged result of all behavior model outputs. This is what the game engine acts on each frame.

remarks.para: MergedIntent represents the final decision after the IntentMerger resolves conflicts between multiple simultaneously-active behavior models.

Resolution rules: - Action: Exclusive (highest urgency wins) - Locomotion: Blendable (targets weighted by urgency) - Attention: Blendable (multiple targets with weights for gaze interpolation) - Stance: Exclusive (highest urgency wins) - Vocalization: Exclusive (highest urgency wins)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Action

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.ActionUrgency

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Intent.MergedIntent.Attention

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter
member.summary: Lightweight interpreter for compiled ABML behavior models. Designed for per-frame evaluation with zero allocations after initialization.

remarks.para: This interpreter uses a stack-based architecture for simplicity and cache efficiency. All values are stored as doubles to avoid boxing and enable SIMD-friendly operations.
The interpreter is NOT thread-safe. Each character should have its own interpreter instance.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.StringTable
member.summary: String table for output string lookup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModel)
member.summary: Creates an interpreter for the given behavior model.
member.param: The compiled behavior model to interpret.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.SetRandomSeed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the random seed for deterministic execution. Call before Evaluate() for reproducible results.
member.param: Random seed (e.g., frame number for replays).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.Evaluate(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the behavior model with the given input state. Returns the output state (action intent).
member.remarks: This method is allocation-free after initial setup.
member.param: Current game state values (must match input schema).
Pre-allocated output buffer (must match output schema).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.ReadUInt16
member.summary: Reads a 16-bit unsigned integer from bytecode (little-endian).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.CurrentStackDepth
member.summary: Gets the current stack depth (for debugging).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.CurrentInstructionPointer
member.summary: Gets the current instruction pointer (for debugging).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.IsPaused
member.summary: Whether evaluation is currently paused at a continuation point.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.PausedContinuationPointIndex
member.summary: Index of the continuation point where evaluation is paused (-1 if not paused).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.EvaluateWithPause(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the behavior model with continuation point pause support. When a CONTINUATION_POINT opcode is reached, evaluation pauses and returns a result indicating the pause. Call Resume methods to continue.

remarks.para: This method is allocation-free after initial setup, maintaining the same performance characteristics as .
When resuming from a paused state, the instruction pointer continues from where it left off. The stack and locals are preserved across evaluations.

member.param: Current game state values (must match input schema).
Pre-allocated output buffer (must match output schema).
member.returns: Result indicating whether evaluation completed or paused.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.ResumeWithDefaultFlow(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Resumes evaluation with the default flow after pausing at a continuation point.
member.remarks: Call this when no extension is available or the timeout has expired.
member.exception: Thrown if not paused at a continuation point.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.ResumeWithExtension(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.IBehaviorModelInterpreter,System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Resumes evaluation by executing an extension model instead of the default flow.

remarks.para: The extension interpreter runs to completion, and its output replaces the current output state. After the extension completes, the base model continues from after the continuation point's default flow.

member.exception: Thrown if not paused at a continuation point.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreter.ClearPauseState
member.summary: Clears the pause state without resuming execution.
member.remarks: Use this to abandon a paused evaluation without continuing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModelInterpreterFactory
member.summary: Default factory for creating behavior model interpreters.

remarks.para: This factory creates new BehaviorModelInterpreter instances on demand. Each call creates a fresh interpreter with pre-allocated execution state.
Future enhancements could include: - Interpreter pooling for reduced allocations - Instrumented interpreters for profiling - Debug interpreters with breakpoint support

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode
member.summary: Stack-based bytecode opcodes for behavior model execution. Different from the register-based expression opcodes in bannou-service.
member.remarks: Instruction encoding: [Opcode:8][Operand1:8][Operand2:8][Operand3:8] Most instructions are 1-2 bytes. Jump targets use 16-bit offsets.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.StoreLocal
member.summary: Pop and store to local variable. [STORE_LOCAL idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.PushString
member.summary: Push string from string table. [PUSH_STRING idx:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Add
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a + b. [ADD]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Sub
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a - b. [SUB]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Mul
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a * b. [MUL]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Div
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a / b. [DIV]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Mod
member.summary: Pop a, b; push a % b. [MOD]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Eq
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a == b, else 0.0. [EQ]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Ne
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a != b, else 0.0. [NE]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Lt
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a < b, else 0.0. [LT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Le
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a <= b, else 0.0. [LE]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Gt
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a > b, else 0.0. [GT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Ge
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if a >= b, else 0.0. [GE]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.And
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if both truthy, else 0.0. [AND]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Or
member.summary: Pop a, b; push 1.0 if either truthy, else 0.0. [OR]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Not
member.summary: Pop a; push 1.0 if falsy, else 0.0. [NOT]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.JmpIf
member.summary: Jump if top of stack is truthy. [JMP_IF offset:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.JmpUnless
member.summary: Jump if top of stack is falsy. [JMP_UNLESS offset:16]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.SwitchJmp
member.summary: Jump table for switch-like constructs. [SWITCH_JMP cases:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.SetOutput
member.summary: Pop value and store in output variable. [SET_OUTPUT idx:8]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.EmitIntent
member.summary: Emit action intent with urgency. [EMIT_INTENT channel:8] Expects stack: [action_string_idx, urgency]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.RandInt
member.summary: Push random int in range. [RAND_INT] Stack: [min, max]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Lerp
member.summary: Linear interpolation. [LERP] Stack: [a, b, t] -> a + (b - a) * t

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Clamp
member.summary: Clamp value to range. [CLAMP] Stack: [value, min, max]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Min
member.summary: Minimum of two values. [MIN] Stack: [a, b]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.Max
member.summary: Maximum of two values. [MAX] Stack: [a, b]

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.ContinuationPoint
member.summary: Pause for possible extension attachment. [CONTINUATION_POINT cp_idx:16] Interpreter checks for attached extension at this point. If extension available: transfers control to extension flow. If no extension and timeout expires: jumps to default flow.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.ExtensionAvailable
member.summary: Check if extension is available. [EXTENSION_AVAILABLE cp_idx:16] Push 1.0 if extension attached, 0.0 otherwise.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorOpcode.YieldToExtension
member.summary: Transfer control to attached extension. [YIELD_TO_EXTENSION cp_idx:16] Used internally when extension is attached.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter
member.summary: Interpreter for cinematic composition using continuation points. Manages streaming extensions and base model coordination.

remarks.para: The CinematicInterpreter wraps a base behavior model and intercepts execution at continuation points. When the base model reaches a continuation point, execution pauses to allow extension injection.
Extensions can be pre-registered or injected dynamically while waiting. If no extension arrives within the timeout, the default flow is executed.

member.summary: Whether execution is waiting at a continuation point.

member.summary: The name of the continuation point currently waiting, if any.

member.summary: The input state array for external modification.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.OutputState
member.summary: The output state array for reading results.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.RegisterExtension(System.String,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModel)
member.summary: Pre-registers an extension model for a continuation point.
member.remarks: Extensions can be registered before or during execution. If registered while waiting at the matching continuation point, the extension will be used in the next Evaluate call.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.InjectExtension(System.String,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.BehaviorModel)
member.summary: Injects an extension that arrived via streaming.
member.remarks: Use this method when an extension arrives from the network while the interpreter is waiting at a continuation point.
member.returns: True if the extension was accepted (waiting at the matching point).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.RemoveExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Removes an extension from a continuation point.
member.returns: True if the extension was removed.

member.summary: Sets an input value by name.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.GetOutput(System.String)
member.summary: Gets an output value by name.
member.returns: The output value, or 0 if not found.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.Evaluate
member.summary: Evaluates the current state, handling continuation points with pause support.

remarks.para: This method uses the new EvaluateWithPause mechanism to properly intercept continuation points at the bytecode level. When a continuation point is reached:

list.item: If a pre-registered extension exists, it executes immediately
Otherwise, enters waiting state and returns "waiting" result
On subsequent calls while waiting, checks for timeout or pending extension

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicInterpreter.ForceResumeWithDefaultFlow
member.summary: Forces resumption with the default flow, even before timeout.
member.remarks: Use this when you know no extension will arrive and want to continue immediately.
member.returns: True if resumed, false if not waiting.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicStatus.WaitingForExtension
member.summary: Waiting at a continuation point for an extension.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.CinematicStatus.ExtensionExecuted
member.summary: An extension was executed at a continuation point.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint
member.summary: Defines a point in execution where the interpreter pauses for possible extension attachment. Used for streaming composition in cinematics.

remarks.para: Continuation points enable runtime extension of executing behaviors. A game server receives a complete, executable cinematic, starts executing immediately, and can optionally receive extensions that attach to named points.

Execution flow: 1. Interpreter reaches CONTINUATION_POINT opcode 2. Checks if extension is attached at this point 3. If extension available: transfers control to extension 4. If no extension: waits up to timeout, then executes default flow

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.NameHash
member.summary: FNV-1a hash of the continuation point name for fast lookup.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.NameStringIndex
member.summary: Index into string table for continuation point name (for debugging).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.TimeoutMs
member.summary: Maximum time to wait for extension attachment (milliseconds). If 0, no wait - immediately use default if no extension.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.DefaultFlowOffset
member.summary: Bytecode offset of the default flow to execute if no extension arrives.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.ContinuationPoint.BytecodeOffset
member.summary: Bytecode offset where the CONTINUATION_POINT opcode is located.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.IBehaviorModelInterpreter
member.summary: Interface for behavior model interpreters, enabling DI and testability.

remarks.para: The interpreter executes compiled ABML bytecode against a provided input state. Each character should have its own interpreter instance (not thread-safe).
This interface enables: - Dependency injection in server-side services - Testability through mocking - Future pooling/caching implementations

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.IBehaviorModelInterpreter.StringTable
member.summary: String table for output string lookup.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.IBehaviorModelInterpreter.SetRandomSeed(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the random seed for deterministic execution. Call before Evaluate() for reproducible results.
member.param: Random seed (e.g., frame number for replays).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.IBehaviorModelInterpreter.Evaluate(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the behavior model with the given input state. Returns the output state (action intent).
member.remarks: This method is allocation-free after initial setup.
member.param: Current game state values (must match input schema).
Pre-allocated output buffer (must match output schema).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Server.Behavior.Runtime.IBehaviorModelInterpreter.EvaluateWithPause(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Double},System.Span{System.Double})
member.summary: Evaluates the behavior model with continuation point pause support. When a CONTINUATION_POINT opcode is reached, evaluation pauses and returns a result indicating the pause. Call Resume methods to continue.
member.param: Current game state values (must match input schema).
Pre-allocated output buffer (must match output schema).
member.returns: Result indicating whether evaluation completed or paused.

member.summary: Gets the current stack depth (for debugging).

member.summary: Gets the current instruction pointer (for debugging).

member.summary: Index of the continuation point where evaluation is paused (-1 if not paused).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Matchmaking.ClientEvents.MatchmakingCancelledEvent.CanRequeue
member.summary: Whether the player can immediately requeue

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Matchmaking.ClientEvents.MatchDeclinedEvent
member.summary:
Sent to all match participants when someone declines.
Includes information about automatic requeuing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Matchmaking.ClientEvents.MatchDeclinedEvent.DeclinedByOther
member.summary: Whether someone else declined (false if you declined)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Matchmaking.ClientEvents.MatchDeclinedEvent.AutoRequeued
member.summary: Whether you have been automatically requeued

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Matchmaking.ClientEvents.MatchmakingStatusUpdateEvent
member.summary:
Periodic status update sent to players in queue.
Provides updated wait estimates and queue position.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceRoomStateEvent
member.summary:
Sent to a client when they join a voice room.
Contains full room state including peer list and connection info.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceRoomStateEvent.Peers
member.summary: List of peers to connect to (P2P mode)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceRoomStateEvent.StunServers
member.summary: STUN server URIs for NAT traversal

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoicePeerJoinedEvent
member.summary:
Sent to existing room participants when a new peer joins.
Contains the new peer's connection details for P2P mode.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoicePeerLeftEvent
member.summary: Sent to remaining room participants when a peer leaves.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoicePeerLeftEvent.PeerSessionId
member.summary: WebSocket session ID of the peer who left

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoicePeerUpdatedEvent
member.summary:
Sent when a peer updates their SIP endpoint (e.g., ICE candidate change).
Clients should update their connection to this peer.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceTierUpgradeEvent
member.summary:
Sent to all room participants when the voice tier upgrades.
Clients should disconnect P2P connections and connect to the RTP server.
SIP credentials are provided for authenticating with the Kamailio SIP proxy.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceTierUpgradeEvent.PreviousTier
member.summary: Previous tier (always p2p for upgrade events)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceTierUpgradeEvent.NewTier
member.summary: New tier after upgrade (always scaled for upgrade events)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceTierUpgradeEvent.RtpServerUri
member.summary: RTP server URI to connect to

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceTierUpgradeEvent.SipCredentials
member.summary: Credentials for SIP registration with Kamailio

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceTierUpgradeEvent.MigrationDeadlineMs
member.summary: Milliseconds to complete migration before P2P disconnects

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceRoomClosedEvent
member.summary:
Sent to all room participants when the voice room is closed.
Clients should disconnect all voice connections.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoiceRoomClosedEvent.RoomId
member.summary: Voice room ID that was closed

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoicePeerInfo
member.summary: Peer connection information for P2P voice

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.VoicePeerInfo.PeerSessionId
member.summary: WebSocket session ID for this peer

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.SipCredentials
member.summary:
SIP credentials for authenticating with the Kamailio SIP proxy in scaled tier mode.
These credentials are dynamically generated per-user per-room and should be used
for SIP REGISTER and subsequent INVITE requests.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.SipCredentials.Username
member.summary: SIP username (typically sessionId or a hash-derived identifier)

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.Voice.ClientEvents.SipCredentials.ExpiresAt
member.summary: When these credentials expire (clients should re-authenticate before this)
